title: Good atmosphere and Great food
desc: We ate in Keyaki Japanese restaurant at Pan Pacific Singapore and had the teppanyaki option. We were at the teppanyaki counter and served by the friendly chef Eric Yong. We lived not just his cooking but also his personality. Eric was friendly, sociable and connect very well . Very good experience and keep up the good work.

title: Excellent choice for wedding anniversary
desc: The experience was fantastic even before we entered the restaurant! There is a beautiful Japanese garden outside the restaurant for nice photographs and the food was amazing with excellent services from Ms Fanny and Mr Jayden!

title: Teppanyaki was great
desc: The food was really good, we had the Ten set menu. The service by Chef Tommy yeo was even better. He made the experience 100x better. Especially the lobster which he made in a different style. Overall really worth the trip down.

title: Kyoto ‚Äòfeel‚Äô dining
desc: Pretty Japanese sen Kyoto feeling place. Not too crowded. Such an experience. Each dish serve quite timely no rush and totally enjoyed! Good wish was still ok. Fresh and nicely cook, pretty standard. Was serve by Fanny and Jayden. Less speaking and refill the drink fast and clean the tablet before the next time serve. Thumb up for the services crew!

title: Best Teppanyaki in Singapore.
desc: We have been to this restaurant many times over the last 30 years and it is by far the best Teppanyaki restaurant in Singapore after all these years. This is largely due to the fact that Eamon Chan is the same chef that has been serving us over the last 30 years. His years of experience shows through in the perfectly cooked beef and seafood. We ordered both the lobster and beef sets and both sets have salmon, scallops & tiger prawns; extremely good value for money. Would keep going back there again and again

title: Best Teppanyaki in Singapore
desc: Very good Teppanyaki in Keyaki, Pan Pacific Hotel. Have been a customer of this restaurant for more than 30 years. Food is very fresh and chef Eamon always served up high quality Teppanyaki. Food is cooked to perfection, from seafood to meats, and chef Eamon is very skilled in Teppanyaki moves

title: Fantastic Sunday Brunch with Friends at Edge
desc: We did our Edge Sunday Brunch booking and reservation was taken by Janice Chan. It was fuss free and immediately confirmed. Service is exceptional and foods are delicious and well prepared as always. Seafoods are fresh and cooked foods taste wondeful.

title: Dinner at the Edge
desc: It was a great experience with friends. We really enjoyed the food and they have a wife variety of choices. I really love seafoods and I am very glad that they served fresh seafoods. üòç Worth the price! And I also want to thank Janice for being so welcoming and very approachable with her sweet smile. Thanks for the experience! We will definitely come back again. üòãüòâ

title: Birthday Dinner
desc: Celebrating my birthday in the Japanese Restaurant- Keyaki. Was served by Jeff and Elsa. They have been very attentive in serving us throughout the evening. They have been extremely helpful in explaining and also recommending their food to us. We totally enjoyed our dinner there. Thanks Jeff and Elsa.

title: Amazing skills by ex mikuni chef
desc: Food and services are excellent in Teppan counter by chef eric . His skills are amazing and we enjoy our dinner ultimately . Chef eric 30 years experience as Teppan chef since inagikh day now mikuni is authentic and fabulous . Thanks and we will definitely come back for more

title: great experience at edge
desc: food is great, seafood section is always filled and staff is attentive. Special mention to staff , Janice so friendly. staff are very attentive and ready to clear the empty plates when you leave your table Thank you for such a pleasant buffet dining experience :)

title: Dinner
desc: Pleasant dining experience at Keyaki. Served by Jeff and Elsa, the Omakase sashimi plate recommended by Jeff is excellent, all ingredients are very fresh and tasty. Soft shell crab maki roll is good to try as well. Was here to celebrate 6-month anniversary and had a cake on the house. Environment is quiet and suitable for small group gathering. All in all a commendable Japanese dinner experience.

title: Great location with super comfy bed
desc: Very comfortable big room with awesome views over marina bay. Staff were friendly and helpful. In room dining was fast efficient and tasty. Only negative in Feb 23 was the renovations which are needed but they impact some of the services like the hotel bar is temporarily closed

title: Outstanding Service and Good food
desc: I‚Äôm a frequent diner in Pan Pacific hotel and especially like their Chinese restaurant Hai Tien Lo. They have very good value for money weekend ala carte buffet and the tim sum n soups are delicious. However, what brings me back regularly is the outstanding service by the team there. They are attentive, personable, professional and always makes me feel like a VIP ! Kudus especially to Patrick and Michelle who always goes the extra mile n ensure my guests also receive excellent service which really impressed them. They are super client focused and knowledgeable and truly deserves merit. Special mention to the manager John as well who is always cheerful, friendly and attentive. Pan Pacific also has a very attractive Pan Pacific Privileges dining programme. It‚Äôs the best

title: Dinner at Keyaki
desc: Good food and service staffs (Elsa and Lissie) Manager : Vincent friendly and gave good adv / recommendations! Must try the botan shrimp sashimi where they fried the head to crispness. Price also reasonable as quality food.

title: Ideally placed for Marina Bay.
desc: Did not get the balcony room we had previously requested. Have stayed at the Pan Pacific before but this time the amount of the atrium closed off due to renovations rather spoilt the ambience of the hotel. One thing I must mention is the one occasion we used the pool restaurant. We were the only people there which resulted in too much attention being given to us whilst we ate.

title: Great staff, poor front desk.
desc: Food and staff excellent, Newley refurbished room 1901 was a joke. I would rate this room as perfect for a businessman travelling solo, but for a mature couple on a multi centre holiday finishing their holiday of a lifetime this tiny room was totally unsuitable and disappointing . The coffee machine had more room space than the tiny wardrobe, which was 30cm wide which also held an ironing board plus hotel dressing gowns.Also a total lack of drawers etc which resulted in our possessions being spread around the room on any flat area.

title: An old friend in Singapore.
desc: We have stayed here on and off since the hotel was built 30 years ago. It has a great position, fantastic club lounge with views and a great staff looking after you. I think the refurbished rooms have been done on the cheap; I preferred the original design. The beds are very good though. That said I have stayed here three times within the last three months. All in all, I like this hotel.

title: Perfect location
desc: Everything was exceptional, apart from the renovations. We had to switch rooms as the newer renovated rooms have a musty/moldy smell. However, they accommodated us and even gave us complimentary services. The staff are great and go out of their way. Friendly and very nice. Big kudos to TJ and Mira at reception/concierge. And to Janice at the edge, so sweet and bubbly!! They are perfectly located. Central to everything.... everything is about 20-30 minutes away by foot. And MRT stations (subway) are close by and so easily accessible. I would definitely go back :)

title: Revisit
desc: A revisit to Pan Pacific for further sightseeing following our last trip 3 years ago, sadly the weather had other ideas, so much rain! Harbour Studio suite on floor 33 with fabulous views across the bay was very spacious, clean and comfortable, plentiful Balmain toiletries and fluffy towels. Best of all was access to the club on floor 38, this absolutely made our holiday and put some sparkle into the rainy days, literally, champagne breakfasts and champagne again with the evening canapes. The food was divine, exquisitely presented, my favourite breakfast was the lobster eggs Benedict. Service was fabulous too throughout the hotel, poolside and front desk, we were given access to a hospitality room before our nighttime flight which was much appreciated., Had a great time,

title: Hai Tien Lo dining
desc: Hai Tien Lo serves excellent food and having great and friendly staff Paulyn who guides us through the menu and recommended great dishes. Attentive and took care of us throughout the dining time. We absolutely enjoyed her hospitality and assistance . Looking forward to return for another great experience. Great job and million thanks Paulyn!

title: Nice food and service restaurant
desc: Great food and service at Hai Tien Lo @Pan Pacific. Impressed by the prawns, little buddha jump soup and osmantha chicken. Our server, Pauline provided great service throughout our meals and was very helpful.

title: Home away from home
desc: I was a memorable stay for 2weeks. . Everyone has been accommodating from the receptionist, concierge, bellhop, room and dining services. I love how I start my mornings with the energy and friendly welcome of Janice at the Edge.

title: Excellent Return to Singapore
desc: We have just returned from a 2 month stay in the Pan Pacific, (our 4th visit since 2018). We would like to say a huge thank you to Shine, Club Lounge Manager at Pan Pacific and her excellent, professional team. They welcomed us each day from breakfast to evening cocktails. It was a pleasure to be there and we enjoyed their conversations, catching up with the staff that had been there since our first visit and getting to know new staff. We very much enjoyed the 360 degree views from the 38th floor of the club lounge, the food, the luxury decor and the relaxing atmosphere - let's hope it always remains this way and we have many more visits to look forward to.

title: Excellent
desc: Very comfortable hotel in the CBD. Really helpful staff - thank you to the Concierge who found us a restaurant (and a taxi on a rainy night) after a late arrival and to chef Nimo who guided us around the breakfast offerings to show what was gluten free, and then went the extra mile by specially preparing gluten free dhosa. The breakfast choice is the best I have ever seen in any hotel - just look on YouTube. We would return if in Singapore.

title: One of my best champagne lunch in SG
desc: The food selections are great with good quality of food. Lobster and oyster always be refill not like other places. My champagne glass always never be empty. Staffs are really helpful. My table served my Janine ‚Ä¶ she is super detail for us. Worth for money and time.

title: Not quite lived up to the dream

title: The Edge Restaurant Pan Pacific
desc: Lunch today st The Edge is awesome due to the excellent hospitality of one of the service crew by the name of Janice. Thank you Janice for arranging the cake as well as taking care of our needs throughout the lunch.

title: Clear-sighted choice for travelling to Singapore

We were here for five a night stay. It really was superb. Thank you Pan Pacific.

title: Pacific bar lounge
desc: Enjoyed so much on champagne breakfast and beautiful scenery with good memories on the cocktails prepared by Tom on Valentines Day. The food quality is excellent and the services are very professional. Will choose to stay on this hotel in future.

title: Relaxing and Pampered.

title: Awesome food and service!

desc: staffs are all very friendly and have good attitude. they also keep coming to our table to clear our tables and help us refill our water without us asking them to. the food served were all of good quality and warm. will definitely visit this place again.

title: Excellent service, views and food
desc: Beautiful, newly remodeled rooms with panoramic views. The service is impeccable. Food at the in house restaurants is exceptional. The spas offers full service treatments and massage. Manisha at the front desk made my check in smoth and easy. She was able to upgrade my room for my birthday, making the holiday even better. title: Enjoyed the buffet at Edge
desc: Had dinner at Edge with friends. Spread was good and staff was helpful. I was served by Nino. Had a great time there with my friends. The lobster was big .Had a variety of food as compared to some others. Thanks, Pan Pac

title: An unforgettable dining experience celebrating our 35th Wedding Anniversary at The Edge@Pan Pacific Singapore.
desc: My wife and I are literally spoiled for choices with so many stations to choose from. Very impressed with the varieties of food presented and the level of service by the service namely Steven and Ms Poh Lan is impeccable.

title: KEYAKI!
desc: We had lunch at Keyaki and the food was great. Chef Eric Yong was friendly and his food was delicious. We had a good and filling lunch. Staff service was efficient and attentive. The atmosphere was peaceful and comfortable. Would definitely come back again.

title: Excellent Crew @ Edge
desc: Always happy to be back @ Edge. Nice ambient , fresh & good spread of food plus Excellent services. The staffs (esp Janice Chan, Crystal Wong, Adil & Ivy) are welcoming, polite, friendly & nice.

title: Excellent service from Tzer Hong
desc: Tzer hong- Service excellent and food are great. A nice place for gathering. Waiter and waitress respond well to our request though the restaurant was almost full of diners. Good job. Will recommend to my friends and family members

title: Tommy Yeo
desc: Perfectly cooked food, incredibly nice and accommodating! We showed up early for our reservation, and was not initially booked for the teppanyaki (our fault), and yet they were able to fit us in without issue!

title: Pan Pacific Singapore
desc: The hotel rooms were excellent as were the staff but you can‚Äôt not have noticed that the building construction works had an affect on our stay as to the smell of glue for the carpets, dust and general noise was everywhere. We were aware of this before our arrival but I did not realise the work was so significant until we got there. However it did cause us a disturbance and there was no point in reporting as what could the hotel do for just someone like us, stop the workings!! The hotel needed to be closed and completed before guests were allowed in.

title: Hai Tien Lou
desc: The quality of food was good, variety is definitely there as well. It was a pleasant dining experience and the service provided by Samuel Lee was great! We will come back again for more in the future!

title: Lovely experience
desc: My family and I had a lovely experience at Keyaki at the Teppanyaki Counter with Chef Eric Yong. The food was well prepared and Chef Eric made it more special. The service staff was also attentive and nice. Would definitely come back again.

title: Review for Mr Abhi
desc: I wanted to express my thanks and appreciation for the wonderful service and care that from Mr Abhi. His excellent professionalism and warmth really made me a pleasant stay at the hotel and a memorable one. Thanks Mr Abhi, i will definitely return stay.

title: Pan Pacific Singapore Outstanding
desc: Outstanding customer service Very clean and tidy , food was fantastic and the staff were brilliant. The hotel is immaculate and has all the facilities you would ever need . Well appointed rooms that were always spotless. The staff really put you at the centre of what they are doing in fact it feels almost like home away from home

title: Birthday Lunch at Hai Tien Lo
desc: Had a filling lunch at Hai Tien Lo during my husband's birthday last March 20, 2023. We only had a few days vacation in Singapore so we were eyeing to eat during the weekend buffet but its already fully booked so we decided to go for the weekday lunch instead. I tried checking in Chope/Table Check and the date that we are aiming to have lunch is already fully booked even on a weekday. Then Sally made our breakfasts even more special by waiting on us hand, foot and finger and encouraging us to sample some of the more exotic dishes on offer at The Edge restaurant.

title: Sunday brunch that‚Äôs perfect for cheat day!
desc: the spread of cheese & oysters are perfect with their selection of wines. go with an empty stomach, everything in Sunday brunch tastes so good! their staff are attentive & will pamper you from start to finish. special call out to their manager Crystal, and other staff who served us - Peter & Lithia, thanks for taking great photos too!

title: Keyaki Teppanyaki
desc: Teppanyaki dinner at Keyaki was sooooo good. Chef Eric was fantastic, friendly and was very open to getting feedback. Get the wagyu beef set, you won‚Äôt regret it. Every course was great, absolutely no complains, just wish that reservations would be easier and less complicated.

desc: Quality of food was great and fresh, especially the sashimi, the pufferfish appetiser, teppanyaki codfish. The staff are professionals and their service was good. We were welcomed by Jeff, Chef Eamon and chef Chun Kiat. They had occasionally drop by to check in with us if the food was alright. title: Fabulous hotel overlooking Marina Bay
desc: I would have given a rating of 10 but unfortunately, as we booked in early from a 14 hr flight from Manchester, the noise from the building work made it very difficult to rest. We were upgraded to a premier club room which was worth the extra money- the room was enormous with a view over Marina Bay. Champagne breakfast, afternoon tea and cocktails and canapes were included in this deal. Really special.

title: Top Bars In Singapore to Visit
desc: Jun Han was simply amazing with the service. I was left with nothing but good experiences all around. Do pay a visit and loook for the gentleman with the slicked back hair ! Also, try out their bar snacks !

title: Friendly team and great experience!
desc: Visited Plume 2 weeks after its opening! Team is knowledge and friendly esp Jun Han. He managed to give us good recommendations of the cocktail based on our preference and made us feel very at home. He also showed us to their private room. Enjoyed our time there!

title: Solid cocktails and service.
desc: Extremely new bar located within Pan Pacific, excellent drinks and hospitality. Loved the theme and classic drinks that they delivered, fresh and delicious. Remember to ask for JH! Would return in a heartbeat.

title: Below satisfactory

title: Perfect location to explore Singapore

Had a recently refurbished room which balcony overlooking Marina Bay which was very nice Breakfast had everything you could think of from hot breakfast, pastries,cereal ,cold meats even pizza. Used hotel pool once which was very quiet and plenty of sun beds and towels provided. Hotel was going through significant refurbishment which meant main bar was closed which was a shame. Great location and very comfortable hotel.

title: The edge buffet
desc: I went for the edge buffet in the hotel and had the best experience in service and taste of food. The wide choices of desserts are definitely the highlight. Janice whom served our table are very helpful and friendly. Highly recommend.

title: excellent

title: Wedding at hai tien lo

title: Five Star Experience
desc: Had a good and wonderful dining experience at Keyaki. Food was good and service was excellent. Was welcomed and served by Jeff, Sharon, Vincent. Chef Eamon and Chun Kiat also surprised us with a plate of sashimi. Jeff really displayed top-notch service standards. Overall a great experience and will definitely come back again. Thank you Keyaki team!

title: Good Dim Sum place
desc: Quality Dim Sum and attentive service crew who recommended dishes for us. We went for ala carte instead of buffet as we are not big eaters. The porridge is really good, unlike the starchy kind. A good place for quality food.

title: Excellent Hotel with magnificent view
desc: Excellent hotel, excellent location for shopping, business, leisure, visits and many more. Stay there for 5 nights for business trip. It was a good stay at Pan Pacific Hotel. easy access to MBS. I will surely stay at the hotel again in the near future.

title: Thanks you Poh Lan is very nice and very helpful üëç good service. üëç
desc: Enjoy dinner with my husband for anniversary and my birthday the staff is very sweet free 2 cake üéÇ for us and wish us happy forever. Thanks poh lan good service and nice üëç we very happy and enjoy it

title: Pan Pacific singapore üá∏üá¨
desc: Highly recommended. Wonderful hotel to stay at. Every department is efficient, friendly, and professional Everyone makes you feel so welcome. Definitely stay again as so central for all the sites to visit.

title: Pan Pacific Singapore
desc: Fantastic stay at this Hotel for a celebration with 4 friends. Abhi and his team could not have been more welcoming. Breakfast at the Edge restaurant were a real treat everyday. The room was fantastic and the view magnificent. Thank you.

title: Keep up with the good service
desc: The staff serving us had provided us with commendable service. His name is Patrick. The majority of the staff in the restaurant has been pleasant. Keep up with the good service. Maybe a review of the menu is needed. It looks tired.

title: Pan Pacific Singapore - great hotel
desc: I have just stayed at the Pan Pacific for 12 days and I want to say how impressed I am with everyone and everything at the hotel - it‚Äôs truly welcoming, from the great staff at the restaurant ( thank you Janice for such great service at the breakfast restaurant each day ) to the cleanliness of the rooms and hotel- look forward to coming back soon

title: Great dinner with Tommy and Suresh at Keyaki.
desc: Teppanyaki Chef Tommy Yeo made our already amazing dinner at Keyaki even more amazing. He gave recommendations on our menu and was thoughtful in considering what will be good for our kids. The food was great, especially the wagyu beef. The waiter Suresh was also very attentive throughout the evening and helpful in preparing our little birthday cake for our boys. Thank you Tommy and Suresh.

title: Wonderful stay overall
desc: We had a 2 night staycation with 3 kids aged 4 and under. The staff all the way from reception to the poolside restaurant staff especially Mr Raja were always so attentive and obliging. Our kids loved eating at the restaurant so much we ate there 3 meals in a row. Not to mention the indoor playground which was a great hit with them. Rooms were clean and big - a deluxe room with a king sized bed and cot were a good size for us, and it was a nice touch that they had kids toiletries. A couple of things which made our stay a little less than perfect: 1. The amount of time the food took to arrive for one of our dinners at the poolside restaurant. We waited about 45min for the mains and by then kids were cranky and needed to go to bed. Staff were very apologetic but limited by

title: Thumbs up.
desc: It was my first time at Keyaki for dinner and the menu / portions were good and tasty. The chef, Tommy, was also friendly and great at what he does. Enjoyed the meal! Yummy! And will be back again soon!

title: Great Experience at Keyaki
desc: Celebrated my birthday at Keyaki and had a really good experience of the teppanyaki meal served by Chef Tommy Yeo. He had a great personality and had good engagement with us throughout the entire meal. Would highly recommend this place! Thank you Chef Tommy Yeo for making my birthday a memorable one!

title: Hai Tien Lo
desc: Best restaurant for Cantonese cuisine. The ambiences and food was fantastic. There is a la crate menu and set meal dinner. Very reasonable priced for all the dishes. Food and service were amazing. The staffs are friendly and attentive to our needs. Would like to thanks Patrick for his gratitude service.

title: Poolside
desc: Was with my 3 kids yesterday bring them for swimming and ordered food from pool bar there,ordered pizza,satay and buffalo wing,buffali wing was spicy pizza and satay was nice,the pool bar staff who attended us Mr Dharma was very kind and humble and provided us very excellent service. Overall was good experience stay in pan pacific.

title: Good review + service
desc: We had amazing food here, and throughout the meal we were served by Kelly. Service given by Kelly was amazing and she was very kind. She helped us clear plates and engaged us in conversations while serving us swiftly. Thank you Kelly for your service, recommended for sure!

title: Service needs improvement but great views
desc: This is the first time I stay in this hotel. Opposite to Mandarin Oriental. Walking to Raffles City, MBFC is really easy. Weather at present is perfect, not too hot. I was allocated a room in the 25th floor with a view facing the marina Bay. It is really pretty. My room is really really massive. The bed can sleep at least 4 people. The bed is very comfortable and the decor is ok. The bathroom looks new. There are sufficient amenities. Free wifi is available. The pool is big but shallow. So did not enjoy swimming there but great to sit by the pool to chill. The service there is brilliant. I was a bit disappointed with the person coming up to take a look at my neoexpresso machine. There were no instructions to tell you how much water u need. The guy who comes up does not

title: Teppanyaki
desc: I just had a fantastic time at the teppanyaki booth. Tommy yeo, the chef was amazing and the food was superb. Try his amazing made sauce with lobster,I definitely recommend this restaurant to anyone looking for a great meal

title: Great food, great fun!
desc: The Poolside Bar and Restaurant is right by the pool (duh) and the kids playground (urban jungle village). Food is great, staff is friendly. Special thanks to Raja, Dharma, Ralph and Meor for your hospitality.

title: One night only
desc: The hotel compared with others that we have stayed at in Singapore is looking a bit dated and particularly dull colour scheme.The rooms are a little well worn but that is countered by the excellent service of all staff that we met whether it was at reception or in the club lounge. Could not have been better served. Well done

title: Chef Tommy Yeo awesomeness
desc: Keyaki Tenpanyakki chef Tommy Yeo was awesome! Made us a special meal when he knew we were celebrating an occasion and gave us special attention. Made our day! Enjoyed our time here thanks to him. Thank you!

title: Chill ambience at poolside restaurant
desc: Great poolside restaurant - came on a weekend. Place has partial views of the city skyline. Not crowded, and the food was fantastic. The coal fired pizza is a must try. Service is friendly and efficient. Nice jumbo chess set and ping pong table by the side for entertainment.

title: Good Staff must compliment!
desc: Mr Patrick has never failed to recognise us when we were seated at the restaurant. I would say he is definitely an asset to the property for his warm hospitality, attentiveness and professionalism. Good things must share good people must compliment too! It‚Äôs great to see you again and we will be back again.

title: 100 stars Tenpayaki experience at Keyaki Pan Pac
desc: The tepanyaki at Keyaki is very tasty and worth for the price. The chef Tommy Yeo is very skilful and friendly. He gave us special treatment when he knew we were celebrating an occasion. Very grateful for the attention and service given!

title: Better sleep than at home
desc: Slept so well at the Pan Pacific Singapore. Breakfast selection is the largest of any hotel I‚Äôve stayed at. Hotel is currently under renovation. As I was not in the hotel during the day it didn‚Äôt affect my stay. Can‚Äôt wait to see the results of the renovation.

title: Poolside bar the added extra
desc: The hotel is lovely, staff courteous and attentive. Despite the renovations that are underway the hotel is an island of tranquility and great service. The best of it is the poolside bar where Raja and Dhorma went out of their way to take care of us and make our trip even more memorable.

title: superb tepinyaki
desc: Booked myself in for two nights at the Pan Pacific and out of the array of restaurants I was fortunate enough to be the recipient of chef Tommy Yeow at his Tepinyaki bar, I love Japanese food and eat it regularly in all corners of the globe, this is for sure up there with one of my best experiences.

title: Keyaki Japanese cuisine
desc: Went to the keyaki Japanese cusine for dinner and was serve by chef Tommy Yeo. Food was so well done by him and definitely will recommend everyone to eat at the restaurant and especially at the counter seat

title: Celebration
desc: The service was very very good and excellent. Food was very very good and very very nice. Everything was very very good and fine. We had a birthday celebration and the birthday cake was very good.

title: Great food at Hai Tien Lo
desc: Kelly was a great host at Hai Tien Lo and we were very impressed by the food, the service, and the ambience. Thanks so much Kelly for the great service. Appreciate and we will be back. My family had a good time

title: Staycation with family
desc: Staycation at Pan Pacific with my family. It is a very good stay. On the day of arrival, Jennie who is the receptionist provided a room upgrade for my parents. I told Jennie that it was my dad's birthday and she gave an upgrade to a better room. Thank you Jennie. Also for our breakfast at the Edge, Janice was very friendly and gave us a very good place to sit. Thank you all for making such a wonderful staycation.

title: Thumbs up to Hai Tien Lo
desc: Excellent food and service from Hai Tien Lou. We had a wonderful dining experience. Highly recommend for family gatherings and birthday celebrations. Do make Reservations in advance to avoid disappointment

title: Excellent F&B dining experience at The Edge
desc: Had my birthday lunch with my family at The Edge. Quality food paired with Excellent service crew especially Auntie Janice who looked after our zone. Not our first time at The Edge and every visit is almost wonderful.

title: Great for short stay
desc: Excellent hotel for location, staff, food, cleanliness and room but the only drawer and shelf for clothing was in the bathroom apart from a rail for hanging. I believe the hotel is more suited to short stay business persons or people travelling on. It is not so suited to clients who are staying several days.

title: Dining at Keyaki
desc: Food at Keyaki is fantastic! We loved the service from Elsa and Liz who were attentive to us. Thank you! Some specialties that left a memorable mark was definitely the miso cod fish which was not too salty and we would still taste the fresh fish, while the teppanyaki asparagus was crunchy and very juicy. The Mango Ume Jelly was very delightful with a surprise of a plum wine jelly! Overall, the dining experience here is wonderful.

title: Thank you Chef Tommy Yeo and Keyaki!
desc: Had teppanyaki here. Chef Tommy Yeo was very warm, friendly and engaging. He gave excellent menu recommendations and his cuisine was totally scrumptious! Very personable service too. Family totally enjoyed the food and experience. Would definitely come back again and have Chef Tommy Yeo cook for us :)

title: Scrumptious family teppanyaki meal!
desc: Chef Tommy was very hospitable and really helped my family feel welcome. The food was extremely scrumptious and we thoroughly enjoyed ourselves. Wagyu was especially melt in your mouth delicious. I will definitely return again in future especially if I‚Äôm craving for teppanyaki.

title: Review
desc: The food is nice the service is good too we enjoy the ambience food and services very much. Although its a lilttle expensive but pretty good experience . There is conplimentary parking for 3 hours too

title: Lunch at Keyaki, pan pacific
desc: Thanks chef Eric Yong at Keyaki for the delicious teppenyaki lunch. Lobster was sweet and tender. I esp enjoyed the fried rice. We sure will come back again. Thanks Suresh for your service as well. üëçüëçüëçüëçüëç

title: Excellent service & food
desc: Food was exquisite! One of the best teppanyaki dinners I've ever had. Ingredients were high quality... Prawns were juicy, steak was tender. All the staff were super kind, friendly, and fast. Chef Eric Yong was knowledgeable and friendly! Suresh was very nice and able to serve us well.

title: Birthday Celebration at Keyaki
desc: Great experience at Pan Pacific. Chef Tommy Yeo was fantastic üòä Great and impeccable service:) Thank you Chef Tommy at Keyaki! Food was yummy too. There was a nice view at the 'Japanese Garden' too.

title: Great dinner with Chef Tommy
desc: Best dining in Singapore. Lots of entertainment and good food. Very friendly service... Try the Japanese white wine which is quite good as well. The surroundings of the pan pacific hotel is also enjoyable.

title: Keeps Coming Back
desc: The Edge is a favourite dining destination for our family. Special occasions are celebrated here. Visiting family and friends are welcomed here with a happy meal. We‚Äôve never been disappointed. Food options are always well thought of and the highest quality. Replenished consistently so always looks appetising. This weekend‚Äôs trip lunch was no different. Shout out to Xylyn for the friendly and attentive service. Can‚Äôt wait to come back.

title: Great place for a soothing afternoon tea
desc: We were served by Sufian and Blair and their service were excellent. They made us feel so welcome and surely looking forward to be dining there again. The ambience is right for small group gathering and sausages were so tasty. Cakes suggested by Sufian were spot on and just right for our palate.

title: Great dining experience at Keyaki
desc: Great dining experience at Keyaki. Food quality is good and naturally price will be more expensive than normal restaurant. Worth the visit as the service is great. Special thanks to Elsa, Liz for their prompt and friendly service. We enjoyed our night and celebration.

title: Great location
desc: This hotel is in a great location and the views from the rooms is fantastic. Our only problem was the renovations that are happening as the smells and noise stopped us using the hotel during the day but on a plus side it made us stay out and see more whilst in Singapore.

title: Excellent Lunch experience
desc: I visited here for my family lunch to celebrate my fathers birthday. We were attended to by Kelly, Hui Qi and Apple. Throughout the service, they were attentive and helped us with refiling our drinks and changing our plates. Food was of a premium quality and great taste. I will definetely come back and revisit.

title: Wonderful experience.
desc: Celebrated my son's birthday at keyaki. The chef - Eric Young is engaging and informative. The teppanyaki dishes are superb. My children love the food. His assistant - Suresh is also prompt in service. Wonderful experience. Will come again.

title: Horrible dealing
desc: Locked out the mini bar and my medicibe atayed out of the frige because they take only credit and i had debt card and cash they refused it. We dont drink alcholo so they could have took wverything out and leave the fridge open. The room smell terrible Bad housekeeping Bathroom doesn't smell good Garbage stayed on the floor for 2 days

title: Great Experience at Keyaki
desc: Went to Keyaki for teppanyaki, and we were wowed and well taken of by Chef Eric Yong. Everything from meat to veggies was done to perfection. Price is fair given the quality of the ingredients. Overall an excellent experience.

title: Fun time at the Poolside Bar!
desc: Really had the best time at the Poolside Bar at Pan Pacific! Raja and Ralph were the best! Stellar service! The spot outside has a nice view of Marina skyscrapers. However, since it‚Äôs the peak of summer, would be great to have some cooling fans because I was sweating the whole time in my suit! Haha. But totally enjoyed it overall!

title: It ticked every box for us
desc: Best hotel I have stayed in - all staff fly the flag for pan pacific in Singapore and make you feel truly respected. The hotel has the most comfortable beds, quality linen, speedy and precise customer service, great food, I like the way they have different buffet bars with signage of varying countries featuring cultural breakfasts, no noise transfer from room to room, great personnel. I would not chose anywhere else to stay in Singapore after experiencing this hotel.

title: The most accommodating and friendly Mixologist
desc: Mc Luther is so friendly and pleasant during our stay at the lounge. So cheerful and still accommodating even if its almost nearing end of his shift. Staff like him makes any guest‚Äô stay at Pan Pacific memorable and will be one of the reasons to go back

title: PLUME bar, best customer experience
desc: Inspired by the colorful birds of Singapore, the treatment in PLUME as customer was overwhelming. I tasted the best sateh ever, from Waygu beef, served in a nice way and accompanied by some beautiful red wine. The service from Rojie, Kishore, Richelle and Kaylee were ecxcellent!! A great suggestion for a night out! Happy to stay in this hotel....

title: Impeccable service by Poh Lan
desc: Our waitress poh lan was very quick and efficient in clearing our tables and plates during our buffet and topping up our water which we greatly appreciated! This led to me and my friend having an enjoyable experience at Pan Pacific. Will definitely be back here again food here was great and fresh as well

title: Great Service rendered by staff
desc: Celebrated my mum 70th birthday in their private room. Their service is great. Special thanks to Paulyn, Apple & Yannis for taking care of the entire group. There is some delay due to the late delivery of the birthday cake & the team specially prepare one cake for my mum. Luckily the cake was able to delivered on time with the special appearance of Fortune God. Even the staff are happy to see the fortune god. Overall a great session spent and special thanks to Hai Tien Lo.

title: Great Stay
desc: Great Stay with friend, its my 3rd time staying at Pan Pacific, and also a great choice. My request has been granted. Only the check in process a bit long time, maybe you could make it more faster as traveler would want to get some rest. the room are perfect, everything was great only the check in process though still early to check in around 12:30 pm, and thanks for that. check out was great at express check out, hoping you will find away also for express check in. the food at breakfast was excellent also.

title: Sorry, This is the first and last time I will be here
desc: I have not actually stayed at the hotel yet but want to comment on my experience booking this hotel. June happened to my wedding anniversary, came across this interesting package which i thought i could unwind with my kids while celebrating my wedding anniversary. Fully understand that the booking is NON CANCELLABLE. However did not notice there was any NON AMENDABLE CLAUSE. title: With the stay!
desc: This is a great hotel with very helpful and friendly stuff. The rooms are well presented with views being awesome over looking the harbour. Checking in and out very easy having assistance with our luggage. The restaurant is have very nice meals with friendly waiters.

title: Pan Pacific club studio
desc: Club studio rooms are big & views were amazingly postcard perfect. Bath/shower & wc separated by the sink. Some studios have a balcony & some not. Don‚Äôt recommend the balcony room with young children as the balcony wall seems low. Lots of storage available- drawers & 2 hanging closets. Full size sofa, 2 armchairs & desk in the living area. Another armchair/footstool in separate bed area. Club lounge is very pretty & with lovely lamps, sofas w tables.

title: RECEPTION TO HAVE PROPER Q INSTRUCTIONS. PLS.
desc: ROOM WAS VERY CLEAN AND COMFY. STUDIO 26 LOUNGE WAS A GOOD PLACE TO CHILL, RELAX AND HAVE A DRINK. GOOD VARIETIES OF BREAKFAST, THE EDGE. NICE! GREAT STAFF TOO! THANK YOU, JANICE (THE EDGE) - LOVE YOUR SMILE! GYM WAS WELL EQUIPED AND HAD WET WIPES SO THAT WE CAN CLEAN THE EQUIPMENTS BEFORE USING. WELL DONE! NO PROPER Q INSTRUCTIONS AT THE CHECK IN/OUT AREA.
