title: Clean and comfortable. Hotel staff all very professional. Had a room upgrade with nice views.
desc: Great hotel - will definitely book again when I visit Singapore. No complaints - room was clean and bed comfortable. Its a nice hotel in convenient location and also connected to shopping centres. Hotel staff lovely to deal with and very helpful.

title: Comfortable hotel at Marina Bay area
desc: I arrived at the hotel at 12 o'clock and I know check in rules are 2.00pm, but the lady at the reservation kindly tell us that the room we booked were ready so we didnn.t have to wait for 2 hours more for check in....thank you. I was stayed at Pan Pacific 12 years ago before I came back to Singapore, the renovation made this hotel were even better. The room were spacious, clean, made me and my family feel comfortable. The pool also nice so I spend much of my time with my little girl there. The breakfast were delicious and lots of choice, still incredible just like 12 years ago. And at last it's location was right next to Suntec City mall and Millenia Walk, near MRT station and a walkable area to Marina Bay area and Garden by the Bay. Keep a good work and I definitely choose

title: Short Staycation
desc: Room was clean and view. Though we did not get the highest level, but the view from our is amazing. The King size bed is the most comfortable bed i even slept in. Breakfast was a little crowded but the food was widely spread. Will consider staying again if the prices are within our budget

title: Practically perfect in every way!
desc: Exceptional (so friendly & efficient) staff, very clean & comfortable rooms - great modern facilities. Delicious food & cocktails - especially buffet breakfast. Close to MRT, Bus, Taxi & major shopping centres and hotels. Perfect location for a first time visitor to Singapore. A home away from home!

title: Pan Pacific foodies
desc: A very good environment for gatherings with family & friends . Will recommend more on my social media. I wish to have more vegetarian/vegan option for different target audience. Thank-you Chef Ethan for your service.

title: Awesome hotel stay but one nasty check in staff
desc: Hotel stay was good, got a room with an awesome view of the marina. Just one gripe, the front office staff - Kalai who was handling my check in was very rude and when I asked him a few other questions he replied annoying while rolling his eyes. I have seen on a few occasion that he has been also rude to other guests and front desk staffs.

title: THANK YOU to all the staff @ Pan Pacific Singapore:-)
desc: The Pan Pacific Singapore was the best hotel experience ever. I stayed there for a week during the Singapore rugby sevens tournament, in April '23. All the staff were so friendly, helpful and very polite. The rooms were so comfy and self contained. The views from my 30th floor room window was unbelieable during the day, but especially beautiful with the city lights, during the night. The buffet breakfast, the poolside bar, indoor gym etc were just amazing. I will certainly be recomending this hotel as a 10/10 rating. And I will surely return to stay there for many more times in future! A special thanks to all the Pan Pacific Singapore staff for their awesome service and great hospitality!

title: Highly discriminatory and disappointing staycation experience
desc: Pan Pacific has exceeded out expectations in delivering a disappointing and discriminatory experience in all aspects and ruined my stay even before my stay started. The concierge staff are highly untrained and rude so for anyone who is reading this please take note before you book a stay here. My partner and I rushed to the hotel to check in after work and arrived at 12pm, there was a long queue at the registration counter. Given that it's a 5 star hotel, there was only 2 staff helping guests with the registration. Finally after 20mins, I got to my turn. I requested and paid for a room upgrade but was told that the room was not ready (I.e. vacant but not done cleaning). I was informed that I will receive a call when the room is ready. We were also not informed about the free

title: Soar with Plume
desc: Kishore and both Hans were extremely hospitable and knowledgeable. You can feel the sincerity to make your experience a great one at Plume. It all began with lovely greeting by Blair dressed in a lovely red dress that seem to mimic birds that the bar is themed after. The drinks are unique and I had Soar which was a really refreshing non alcoholic drink. The rest had alcoholi which were presented beautifully and tasted great too!

title: Great service and ambience
desc: Splendid service from Han, Meor and Kishore, who were attentive, friendly and helpful. Cocktails were good. Bar snacks portion was okay and taste alright given its their second week of operating. Will be good to have Happy hour during the weekdays to attract more crowd.

title: An excellent hotel close to the CBD
desc: This is one of the nicest hotels in which I have ever stayed. The public spaces are beautifully appointed, all the staff were amazingly helpful with a "can do" culture and the restaurant served the most comprehensive buffet selection I have ever witnessed. Just look at the numbers of locals using it for birthday celebrations! It is not cheap but it is very handily placed next to the Convention Centre and the Marina Bay shopping complex. If you can go for an upper floor the view in the outside lift are quite amazing.

title: Teppanyaki at Keyaki
desc: Did a reservation with Keyaki on 26 Apr 23 for 4 pax dinner. We opted for Teppanyaki ( Ten ) menu and some ala carte dishes. We sat at the counter which can see the chef cooking. Chef Eric was the chef cooking for us. All of us enjoyed our dinner for the night. Fresh ingredients and good cooking techniques displayed by Chef Eric. Seeing him cooking our food is just like watching a performance. The star for the night was the Sashimi, lobster and Wagyu steak. Service from ground staffs were good too. Will be back!

title: Pan Pacific, Room with a view of your not hungry.!
desc: Although for the price of hotels was acceptable there were a few issues the hotel brushed under the carpet. Firstly on arrival our credit card seem not to work which the reception did not try to help us with by using a different machine! Funny as it work all across Singapore and even in Borneo! The bedroom was an upgrade and was a room with a view. No fault there. Breakfast, now there is a story, take a stool with you.. at least a 45 min wait if you go down at 9.00, mayhem. Second morning even worse. Waited the 45mins then asked to sit in the lobby. Our breakfast would have been cold on return!!!!!. The food was plentiful and varied if it was still there by the time you got seated. Breakfast san not cope when the hotel is full nor can the staff. The floor manager was

title: Great lunch
desc: We had lunch at Keyaki. As always, ambience and service were excellent. The chef, Tommy Yeo, was wonderful and made the meal very special. Food was well prepared and even had complimentary dishes. We come here on special occasions and would definitely come back again!!

title: Great rest stop at Pan Pacific
desc: This was our second time to Singapore, first time with Pan Pacific. Despite check in being crazy (probably due to the holidays), the staff, especially manager Connie, handled it extremely well and professional. We had a great stay at the hotel -- the food in the club was top notch, unparalleled by far (compared to the average Hyatt or Marriott/Westin regency club). Highly recommend! Thanks to all Pan Pacific staff for making our trip comfortable and memorable.

title: Great experience on a business stay at the Pan Pacific
desc: Great stay at the Pan Pacific. I stayed 4 nights at the 28th floor on a business trip, and had access to the business lounge on the 36th floor- great views and wonderful service and food. The reception staff was amiable and professional, at check in and check out, the bell-boys team courteous and helpful, the food diverse and delicious (I also had breakfast at the main dinning room twice) Overall the hotel was great value for the money. Recommended for business and city break trips.

title: Great buffet at Pan Pacific
desc: Excellent service and the staff are very friendly and accommodating. Especially Peter as he always come to our table from time to time to check if we need any assistance and thanks also to Crystal for being so nice and accommodating. We enjoyed our dinner and hope to dine in again.

title: The Edge breakfast buffet is amazing (and so is Janice!)
desc: Really good hotel, great location for esplanade, marina, short walk to raffles, etc. Fantastic service from all. The edge breakfast buffet is superb, amazing selection and quality. Hotel lobby was being refurbished, not an issue. Rugby 7s were in town, which did mean pool area was very busy with them, made it unappealing for families with young children occasionally, which was a little disappointing. But overall did not detract too much from experience. Would definitely stay again.

title: Buffet Lunch at Edge
desc: The dining experience at Edge was fantastic, service was tiptop, Staff Ivy Tan was excellent, attentive, friendly, helpful when we ask for things. Food is excellent,good spread of buffet lunch, price is worthy Good ambience Happy to recommend anyone to the Edge.

title: Great 5 Star teppanyaki
desc: Really good quality teppanyaki at a restaurant with beautiful atmosphere. Food was amazing and the service was first rate. Chef Eric Yong and waiter Suresh were excellent with attention to detail re our good restrictions. Thank you!

title: Good service and buffet spread
desc: Quite disappointed about the oysters. Some dishes are excellent like laksa, naan with vegetable curry. Salmon sashimi was good. Generous portion compared to other restaurants. Ivy Tan‚Äôs service is excellent. She was prompt in clearing our empty plates and served us hot beverages promptly.

title: Great food great ambience
desc: Had Sat Brunch on 1 Apr and the experience was wonderful. Nicely done rib eye that simply melt in the mouth. Durian pengat and chocolate creme are nicely done. Roasted pork comes with cracking skin. Fresh oysters kinda small though. Cakes and pateries so-so only. No juice bar, only served plain water which is a no-no to me.

title: Keyaki - a fantastic experience
desc: We had dinner to celebrate a birthday at the teppanyaki counter. We were served by Chef Tommy, who did an excellent special Mayonnaise sauce for the prawn dish. Very entertaining and engaging. Highly recommended, and our favourite teppanyaki place in Singapore.

title: Keyaki and Eric. The best there is.
desc: My wife and I went to Keyaki to celebrate her birthday. I must say that the teppanyaki there is one of the best in Singapore. The chef, Eric, has great skills and is professional. You can easily sense that he takes exceptional pride in cooking good food, and making sure that his customers are fully satisfied. The wagyu beef simply melts in your mouth, and that‚Äôs an understatement. This place is highly recommended.

title: Amazing teppanyaki dinner @ Keyaki
desc: My fiancee and i spent our anniversary at Keyaki at Pan Pacific. We ordered Ten and Hana set which consisted of lobsters and wagyu. Chef Tommy Yeo made us a special lobster that was super amazing and was very attentive to our taste buds. He also made sure we had a great time which we did. We will be coming back for sure!

title: Excellent teppanyaki
desc: The teppanyaki here is excellent and delicious. Chef Tommy is a great cook and extremely entertaining. Will return for more dining sessions here. Definitely will recommend my friends and relatives to try it out.

title: Pan Pacific hotel - buffet
desc: The food is fresh and nice. Ethan Chef well service and very friendly, his food is very delicious ü§§. The view very nice to take pictures and enjoy chitchat with friends. Will comeback with friend another day!!

title: Impressive
desc: First time at Pan Pac. Very impressed. Exceeded expectations. Edge breakfast spread was very good. Highly recommended. Ongoing construction but not bothered by it. Service level is impeccable. Staff are well trained. Will definitely be back.

title: Super nice
desc: Thank you for excellent service all the staff especially Eric Yong and Suresit. No doubt to revisit here again. All the moments are very nice with my friends. Best my birthday party here. Super nice.

title: Excellent brunch in cosy environment
desc: We had Dim Sum buffet at Hai Tien Lou @Pan Pac. Good selection of menu, Fresh ingredients and Great service from Wei Jian and all. Comfortable table arrangement that was spaced out giving each group of diners privacy - conductive for good catch up with friends.

title: Awesome Keyaki
desc: Chef Eric‚Äôs lobster, beef and prawns with his own signature sauce was absolutely delicious! He also put up a fancy fire show for our entertainment. Service staff Suresh was attentive at all times. Be sure to pay a visit to Keyaki that will transport you back to Japan!

title: Great Ambience, Great Food, Great Service
desc: We had the privilege to dine at the wonderful Keyaki to celebrate my wife's birthday earlier today. The food was superb and we thoroughly enjoyed the exquisite taste. Moreover, we were pampered by Liz & Nicole who were very gentle and patient. They took such great care of us. We had a marvelous experience. My wife was glad to have celebrated her birthday at your restaurant. Thank you and we look forward to dine there soon.

title: Anniversary dinner @ Keyaki, Pan Pacific.
desc: Went to Keyaki for teppanyaki, our chef was Tommy, he made sure that we had a great time & even served us a really great dinner that my fianc√©e and I enjoyed so much. We had the Hana (seafood + lobster) & Ten (wagyu + lobster), all the food was amazing. One of the courses, he served us his speciality lobster which was so delicious! Will definitely come back again.

title: A memorable birthday at Keyaki - Teppanyaki
desc: Keyaki's Teppanyaki Chef Tommy Yeo hails from Nobu and serves up a good conversation as qell as some truly fancy lobster. The Wagyu sirloin was spot on, tender, juicy and flavourful, and I couldn't resist adding those savoury garlic "chips" into my garlic fried rice for an intense 2-way garlic fried rice :) Thank you for the meticulous service by manager Joseph for me & my hubby, and the most considerate touch by Chef Tommy, taking care that we needn't have to wait upon ordering, lapping up our food piping hot.

title: Best Cocktails ever!
desc: The Mixologist at the Pacific Lounge, Mc Luther, is very hospitable and provided us excellent customer service. We really enojoyed the best tasting cocktails!!! Thank you so much Mc and the rest of the staff in the Pacific Lounge!

title: First time at Keyaki
desc: Had a birthday celebration with my wife and tried out Keyaki for the first time. Heard their Teppanyaki was good and it did not fail. The Kaze set was filling and well paced. I ordered some ala carte dishes and some hits and misses but overall still a pleasant experience. The real star was Jayden. Excellent and prompt service, he really delivered a 5* experience for us. At the end of the night, he asked if it was any of our birthday and surprised my wife with a slice of cake. Thank you! It was a lovely touch.

title: Top Rate Hotel
desc: Everything experienced in this hotel is more then expected. Friendly, helpful staff that go out of their way to ensure ones comfort. The 38 floor for breakfast, lunch and or dinner is so relaxing with views all around.

title: Swimming pool and bar
desc: I enjoyed 1 night stay here but feel unhappy with swimming pool service,we need to find a barmen when we would like to order something as there is no one inside the bar we notice only 1 barmen for whole swimming pool to serve the all other patron and we left out without order anything and we would like the hotel management to look in to it.

title: None
desc: haven't been staying in Pan Pacific after the pandemic. the room condition is still well maintained. They also added in water filter system to provide drinking water iso bottled water. thanks for supporting substantiality.

title: Fantastic Sunday Brunch with Excellent Service!
desc: Great Sunday brunch spread with amazing customer service from all the staff at the Edge restaurant! Seared foie gras was served at today‚Äôs Sunday brunch. We did not expect to have foie gras at a buffet. This excellently executed dish is definitely a very pleasant surprise. The seafood station served the European variety of oysters, which is not so plump and fleshy, but extremely fresh and sweet. You can have as many as you want without feeling too full, which is great! As you then have more capacity to try out all the other mouth watering food. The snow crab is also very sweet with nice firm meat. The cheese platter selections, sashimi, prime beef, roasted lamb, pumpkin soup, Singapore chilli crab and ginseng soup definitely deserve a thumbs up too! Dessert lovers are in

title: A Must Try in Singapore.
desc: Do check out the newly renovated Premier Rooms. Excellent! And Chef Tommy Yeo of Keyaki Japanese Cuisine, superb Tepanyaki Chef! His lobster recipe is to die for. And a very pleasing personality to boot.

title: Wonderful experience at edge
desc: Have buffet at edge, there were wide variety of food. Met my expectations, great & attentive service by edge staff by Ms Janice. She is so warm & helpful. Makes me feel like home the moment I step into edge with her friendly smile. Would definitely come back again soon with my family. Thumbs up! :)

title: Great food, even greater service
desc: Were there for lunch and it was a great experience both with the food and service. Special shout out to Janice who is so sweet and friendly and helpful. Her positive vibe opened up our appetite :) congrats to Edge for having such wonderful staff member.

title: Awesome food and ambience
desc: Best teppanyaki ever, specially cooked by Chef Eric Yang who creates his own sauces making each item super delicious! We tried the Hana set with fresh sashimi, tempura and seafood. His team also serves well namely Suresh and Xiugene!

title: Pan Pacific Number 1
desc: From the moment we arrived the staff were excellent. We were then granted a wonderful upgrade for our unfortunately only 1 night stay. The room needless to say was fantastic and the view was amazing both during the day and at night. See attached photos. We shall return hopefully for longer next time.

title: Compliment to Mr. Chin Chee Heng
desc: I'm penned this review to praise one of the chef, Mr Chin Chee Heng Ethan, for his initiative and attentiveness. After hearing my comments on the oysters being 'skinny', he made an effort to explain this batch is from France etc. The best thing was,he surprised me with a dozen of oysters served to me table. That's impressive and I must pen to give Ethan this credit!

title: Dinner at Keyaki
desc: Great dining experience at Keyaki. The tenpan counter is awesome; and Chef Tommy is very generous with the portion and quality. It‚Äôs our first time at the tenpan counter, the experience is great for children!

title: Superb service
desc: Wowwwwwwwwwwwwww!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Service provided by your Chef Chin Chee Heng, leaves me and my family a unforgetable dinner. He attend to our request by serving us some bigger fantastic oyster when we mentioned that the previous serving was too skinny and small. Kudos to your chef... He is definitely an asset to your establishment. Well done.

title: Great food and service
desc: The food variety was great! Our waitress Ivy was quick to help w clearing our plates and friendly when taking photos for my family and I. I look forward to coming back once again with my family and friends.

title: Amazing and unforgettable Teppanyaki experience
desc: Amazing and unforgettable experience at Keyaki with Chef Eric Yong who skilfully prepared the dishes - Teppanyaki beef and seafood multi-course set. We sat at the teppanyaki counter and enjoyed chit chatting and watching him perform. He cooked every dish to perfection - especially the lobster prawn and beef fillet. Left us wanting more so we will definitely be back and recommend this place to our friends and family! Special mention for Joseph, Suresh and Sharon who were attentive and helpful through our dinner.

title: Great buffet with excellent service from Ivy Tan
desc: There was a wide range of selection for the buffet lunch and the food quality was amazingly good. To make the experience even better we were served by Ivy Tan who constantly check on our well being and provided us with top notch service. Although there was a minor mistake made by the other staff who cleared our birthday cake while we were away to take more food, she immediately came to do do service recovery and checked on us. We were ever so grateful and blessed to be served by her. Thank you Pan pacific for providing us with such a competent service crew and making my fianc√©e birthday lunch a wonderful one.

title: Keyaki teppanyaki
desc: We sat at Teppanyaki counter, chef Eric‚Äôs golden sauce prawns is a must have. Excellent! Beef was also perfectly cooked. Suresh the server is also very attentive and friendly. Will definitely return!

title: Wonderful Dinner and Encounter with Friendly Staffs
desc: The food very fresh and well cooked. Lots of variety to choose international buffet at The Edge. Staff were very friendly they put on smile while working. I was surprise given birthday cake by staff Janice Chan whom made the reservation for me. Thankful for the wonderful experience.

title: Edge buffet dining experience
desc: We made edge booking with Janice. She so nice to assist and even arrange a birthday cake for my friend. And my friend commented the caje is very nice. Greatly appreciate for the little gesture and thoughts that made our dining a nice experience.

title: Our stay at Panpacific Singapore
desc: We stayed at Panpacific Singapore from 10 May to 14 May 24. I attended a conference at Subtec city convention Center ( connected with the hotel) while my family looked around marina bay and marina shopping mall ( connected with hotel). Esplanade MRT is a walking distance and convenient. Jenny at Checkin counter did an exceptional service with empathy , when she saw my family waiting at lobby and helped us proactively. Wonderful experience all to gather. The view from 2.0 the floor was spectacular. Breakfast served at Edge was really nice with many options. Three cheers. I am a discovery member.

title: Professional staff, great food, amazing experience.
desc: Service staff Wei Jian was extremely professional and friendly, food was amazing and exquisite as well. My family enjoyed our time there. Thank you for the amazing experience, Hai Tien Lou. Highly recommend.

title: All thanks to Ms Javi for her excellent service!
desc: All thanks to Ms Javi who have made it possible to go the extra mile and follow-up what is necessary and made it possible for me to have a smooth, enjoyable, satisfying stay to celebrate my partner's birthday! I am super thankful for her efforts.

title: It certainly redeemed itself
desc: This was a complimentary night given for an issue I had last time I stayed. How hotels react and respond to issues raised is what sets some hotels apart. My previous issue would not make me hesitate to recommend or stay again. It is both a great and special place to stay. The staff are all wonderful. I did not meet a single person who did not want to do the best for you. The rooms with their floor to ceiling windows are short of nothing, including the best hotel robes ever. I regretted not buying one last time, so I definitely did this time. The welcome gift chocolates are a nice touch. The bed was very comfortable. The modern touches of electric curtains and lights that go off as you leave and come on as you enter. The bathroom was larger than some hotel rooms with both

title: Five-star experience
desc: Had the teppanyaki - food was amazing, and service was even better! Was served by Tommy Yeo and co. who were were extreme hospitable and made the night really enjoyable. Will definitely be back again!

title: Excellent hotel in perfect location
desc: We upgraded to a Club Room and it just made our stay that bit extra special. A private check in desk/concierge is also a very nice addition. Our room was beautiful, with an amazing view of the bay. The staff in the Club Lounge are very attentive, friendly and always greeted us with a warm welcome. Breakfast, afternoon tea, canap√©s and cocktails are all included in the upgrade, which makes it good value for money. The breakfast menu is very good with the addition of quite an extensive buffet. We did try breakfast at the main buffet, Edge, which had so much choice it was mind boggling. However, we preferred breakfast in the club room for its tranquility, view and level of service. Cocktails in the lounge, while looking out over the Singapore skyline, Singapore Eye and the Marina

title: Great location. Spectacular architecture
desc: Did a last min booking in the morning for a same day stay as it read somewhere that pan pacific has an urban jungle ‚Äò indoor kids playground‚Äô It was the initial pull factor as we had nth to do for the day and we need an avenue to burn my child‚Äôs endless energy. Arrival service was cold, initially thought that there is a chargeable valet parking service but was told that it is a chargeable self parking at the front. Hotel do provide complimentary parking at the basement sharing with Marina Square. The checking in lobby was a mess. There is only 1 queue for all including discovery member. The discovery check in desk should have a carpet or some sort to demarcate the difference so GHA member can access the discovery check in counter without queueing in the general queue.

title: Excellent but pricey
desc: The hotel was close to the convention center so it was very convenient. In fact, I walked back twice as the taxi queues were just too long. The room was very spacious and it came with all the necessities though I hadn‚Äôt packed a shaving kit expecting there would be one at the hotel. But upon requesting, they immediately sent me one. The staff from the check in counter to the bell boys and servers were quite helpful and friendly. I did encounter a short waiting time when I had to check out earlier and leave my luggage at the hotel but it didn‚Äôt spoil my stay. Undergoing some renovations but the atrium lobby still takes my breath away. Cheers!

title: Teppanyaki Multi-Course
desc: Celebrated my husband's birthday at Keyaki with the Teppanyaki Multi-Course. Ambience was great and food was good. It was a nice dinner with the friendly teppanyaki chef, Tommy Yeo and the wonderful service staff.

title: Staycation
desc: Value for money?‚Ä¶‚Ä¶nah. Room?‚Ä¶‚Ä¶No biggie for Deluxe Panoramic room (King). Pacific Club Lounge?‚Ä¶.. underwhelming spread during evening cocktails and canap√©s. Service level?‚Ä¶.. above average (huge mitigating factor). Overall?‚Ä¶.. forgettable

title: HAI TIEN LO GOOD FOOD AND SERVICE
desc: Food was good. We order the carnation menu.the soup was good. Sever by huiqi. She was so nice and friendly, we come for celebrated my mother birthdays,when we having the dessert, she serve the longevity bun to us. We all very happy and enjoy it.

title: Good location and services
desc: Well located if you want to be near Marina Sands. Good rooms, nice pool and gym. In my opinion, breakfast buffet should be improved and they have to provide more restaurant choices, other than the chinesse restaurant and the buffet

title: Another fabulous stay at this amazing hotel
desc: This is our 5th visit to this hotel in 5 years. We never stay anywhere else. Most people think they should stay at the Marina Bay Sands but it's so busy and it's much like Changi airport!! The Pan Pacific is very welcoming and the staff are amazing. We always stay in a Pacific Club room so we have access to the club for breakfast, afternoon tea and cocktails and canap√©s. The staff there greet you by name, waot on you hand and foot and make you feel so special. The food is always great and there's so much choice. The door staff open your car door, greet you, take your luggage from you and start your stay off making you feel like a celebrity. They always have a smile on their faces and will help and guide you whenever you need it. I can't fault the place. After visiting the

title: Terrible service for a business hotel
desc: Room was fine and room service decent. But overall terrible service for a business hotel - very slow check in and check out. I travel and stay in hotels for weeks every year, and I often drop off my room key in the morning and get electronic receipts to save paper and for convenience. I never received a receipt from the Pan Pacific hotel for my stay, and after 5 phone calls over the past week speaking to 3 different people, the front office still has not emailed me a receipt. This should be a 30 second request and is unacceptable for a business hotel - I‚Äôve spent hours now trying to chase this receipt down. Now I am late for my corporate card payment and need to pay a late fee as I can not submit my receipt to claim from my company. What a disgrace!

title: Teppanyaki Experience
desc: Being served by Chef Tommy was an AMAZING experience! Not only was the food good but the entertainment aspect was also interesting! 10/10 if you like a good meal and experience with either your friends or your date!

title: A hotel with reception staff who behave in a manner not suited for a "5" star rating.
desc: For a "5" star hotel, the customer service is a bit hit and miss. The staff in the restaurants and bars are extremely good at their jobs. As were the staff at the pool and the indoor playground. The reception staff however, could do with some customer service training. And worst of all this hotel seems to draw some very very inconsiderate guests. Such as people who try to close the lift doors before you can pull out your key card to select the floor. Or those who choose to verbally push around women with children in the que for the reception. Absolutely disgraceful.

title: Perfect place to dine with your family and friends!
desc: We had our buffet dinner here at Pan Pacific Singapore last May 19, 2023 to celebrate my cousin‚Äôs birthday. We were assisted by Steven, Rhadz and Peter and they were very warm and welcoming. We were also greeted by Chef Pete, and I appreciate that he took time to check if we are enjoying the food and if we need anything else. The selection of food (from local to foreign cuisines) were great and everything tastes good! It‚Äôs been long since I had a sumptuous dinner so I really loved that my cousin took me here. We truly enjoyed our experience here at Pan Pacific Singapore. I will definitely visit again. I will also recommend this to my friends and colleagues who‚Äôs planning to go to Singapore soon.

title: Great hotel with a good location
desc: A large and busy hotel located right next to Marina Bay Sands, connected to 2 great malls. Can‚Äôt go wrong with location! Look out for the lifts with a view!The buffets for breakfast and dinner are plentiful and reflect a number of the cultures - almost overwhelming but very luxurious! The bar is lovely and there are a number of restaurants to choose from. The spa, although small, offered us some very enjoyable and relaxing treatments. Sadly, when we arrived our room was very unclean. Roxanne the duty manager did however go out of her way to ensure our room was changed and offered us a room with a wonderful view, which we thoroughly appreciated. I would recommend this hotel but the cleaning standards should be improved, regardless of how busy they are. The rooms, although

title: Delectable Spread To Relish
desc: Upon our return to Pan Pacific Edge after a hiatus of about a year, we were greeted with equally scrumptious spread and impeccable service by Steven and Aishah. Set to indulge the appetite of even the most fastidious taste buds, the delightful ambience and well-presented food is second to none. üëçüëèüôè

title: Great Service by Fang Mei
desc: Great service rendered by Fang Mei during breakfast service at Edge. My daughter was feeling unwell and accidentally vomited. Fang Mei was quick to assist and clean up. She was very understanding and kept a smile at all times. She also quickly helped to set up the table again so that we can continue our meal. Big thanks to her!

title: Family holiday
desc: Beautiful hotel. Perfect location. Loved our time in Singapore. Thankyou so much. Breakfast wonderful. Pool lovely. Great lifts on outside of the building. Very quirky. Comfy big bed. Design of hotel is amazing.

title: excellent service
desc: Roxanne and Durga Excellent service and good service. Help me a lot even I trouble them . My sincere apology to trouble them for the cancellation. They really assist me very well With the great services.

title: Sally is the best server!
desc: Sally is the absolutely best server in the Edge Restaurant at Pan Pacific, Raffles Blvd. She is personable. Suggested which entrees to sample at the expansive breakfast buffet. Always smiling. She helped make our time in Singapore more memorable. Pan Pacific is lucky to have her on staff.

title: Amazing Service from Janice
desc: Janice is a superstar at the Edge restaurant, the best variety of breakfast you‚Äôll ever find in Singapore! Great hotel with the best service, thank you Janice and team! :) we will surely gonna recommend this to everyone back home.. see u again!

title: Great buffet experience
desc: Very good selection of food. Janice recommendations were spot on! Seafood was fresh, cheese selection were good, good desserts. Great cold cuts as well! Would love more hot seafood but the sashimi bar made up for that

title: Memorable Dinner
desc: It was same feeling as before all was great. Staff are amazing, Raj, Xylyn and the rest of the team that are on duty from service to kitchen team. All are amazing. They even surprised me with birthday cake. Appreciate they remembered my birthday without telling them. Fell so love as always!

title: Dining
desc: First visit and was of a pleasant one. Friendly staff and professional service. Keep up the good work. üëç restaurant was full and staff did their outmost best to keep up with the food serving and clearing of empty plates. Thank you

title: Amazing service and food
desc: Rose and Shasha were really great at what they do, making my entire group of over 40 pax feel right at home throughout our dinner event. They were also really attentive to ours needs. Would definitely come back again if the opportunity arises again!

title: Awesome bar Plume! Delicious Cocktails and Perfect Service
desc: It was my first time at Plume and I was blown away by my experience tonight. The cocktails were yummy, nice selection of expensive alcohol (Louis XIII, clas azul and hibiki 21 anyone?) but most importantly the service is perfect. Jun han and team are amazing. I will definitely be back, all for the service

title: Hotel in a great location & with a wonderful breakfast buffet
desc: A 5 night stay at the Pan Pacific Singapore at the beginning of May. My room was on the 27th floor with a nice view and no noises. Worth being aware that if you are travelling with others & their room is on a different floor, your room card will not work in the lift to take you to their floor. This was my first time at the Pan Pacific and the breakfast buffet was one of the best I have experienced at any hotel I've stayed at - the choice was amazing. Will definitely look at staying at this hotel again!

title: Great food and Ambience at Keyaki
desc: Food and ambience is great. Chef Tommy Yeo is very friendly and made our experience at keyaki a very enjoyable one. His food was really well done. For teppanyaki, we recommend the Hana set which comes with seafood and a whole lobster!

title: Awesome experience, thanks Jun Han, Meor , Putra!
desc: We were at Plume for after dinner drinks and to check out the new bar, was blown away by the charismatic Jun Han who impressed us with his knowledge and confidence. Meor was attentive and friendly, always checking on us every once in awhile to make sure we're taken care of. Putra charmed us with his spontaneous jokes, overall it was an awesome experience thanks to these bunch of superstars. Would definitely swing by again just for these guys.

title: Recommend to visit
desc: Krishore was very friendly and able to recommend cocktails according to our preference. The ambience is good, all other service crew was friendly. Drinks are good however, the churros that we ordered can be improved. Not very crispy.

title: Drinks ftw
desc: Awesome service! The staff are really attentive and will check in on our needs. Thumbs up! Definitely will visit this place with my friends and family again. One thing to improve on is probably the choices of desserts.

title: Pan Pacific Janice
desc: Excelente location Excellent accommodation, very clean and well maintained Excellent food a the restaurant‚Äôs Staff very kind and friendly in special Janice at Hai Tien Lo, where she always remember to call Me by my name. For sure if I come back will stay her

title: Interesting bird concept!
desc: Nice ambiance & very nice concepts of the drinks. Wait staff was very friendly and knowledgeable on the drinks & made solid recommendations. Also able to order drinks off the menu. We ordered the churos - but it could be better. It's alittle soggy and not crispy.

title: Edge Restaurant
desc: Went to Edge Restaurant and Rose was very friendly and accommodating. She made our visit very memorable and happy. The ambience of the restaurant is nice and the food selection is wide as well with fresh seafood.

title: Excellent and stylish
desc: This was my 2nd visit to this hotel....Excellent location, clean and very comfortable. I thoroughly recommend this property. Arriving into the main foyer of this hotel gives you that 5 star feeling and service.

title: Son's Birthday Meal
desc: Looked after by Chef Tommy Yeo. He's amazing and detailed! After asking us if it was a special occasion, he gotten arrangements for a slice of cake n some additionals for the birthday boy. Good service and good food all round!

title: Rude staff. Bidet is a luxury here. Useless marketing team
desc: The hotel is good but has many pitfalls. 1. The staff is rude. This is from the front desk to the reception staff. 2. The staff at the lobby is inefficient. There are times no one to open cab doors and receive the guests. Don‚Äôt know why they are paid? 3.There is no bidet in the toilet of the rooms but only in the suite rooms. Even public toilets have bidets. Bidet is not some luxury facility that is to be provided only in suites 4. The marketing team is inefficient, there was a bathtub promised on GoIbibo.com for our room but it was not given. I took this matter to the front desk but the staff is so rude that you cannot talk to them. She just clicked the picture and said we cannot do anything.

title: New place, new experience at Plume
desc: New chill-out area after their renovation. The older place, The Atrium, was good but now with Plume, it‚Äôs a totally different concept and a good one as well. Was thinking the place will be too ‚Äòforestry‚Äô (as it‚Äôs adapting a more nature theme) but the deco and sounds are on point. Service is superb too!

title: üëçüèª
desc: We had a wonderful time at the Plume. Warm hospitality and friendly staff. Thanks to Mcor, Kisitore, Nabil and Jeremiah for sharing the knowledge of the cocktails and ‚Äúbird food‚ÄùüòÜ We were amazed with the ant Gin from AustraliaüòÜüòÜüòÜ

title: Great experience
desc: Great experience, friendly and professional staffs like Adhi from reception, fabulous location. We were enjoying all facilities like pool, urban jungle play room, gym and games. The breakfast at the Edge was fantastic, I will come again!

title: Awesome Staycation
desc: As always enjoy my stay here. Received upgrade as a Titanium member. Great and efficient service by Gian. Friendly & welcoming staffs at the door. The service at Pacific Club was great too. Equally prompt service during checkout. Overall the service is fantastic. Thank you.

title: Enjoyable Birthday Staycation
desc: Booked a staycation for my mum and my auntie as birthday treat. They were delighted with the birthday deco in the room and the surprise sweet treat. There was wide variety in the daily breakfast and service was brisk despite the restaurant being full. Special thanks to the service staff: Janice, Kenneth, Lee Kee

title: Plume
desc: Plume is a very nice environment Kishore gave me very nice service and. Good knowledge and very cozy whisky was serve in nice glass I feel like home I will definitely will come back chill with bar snacks

title: AWESOME PACIFIC CLUB BIRTHDAY STAYCATION
desc: Prior to stay : Email are promptly reply. Reception Check in : Lobby looking bright and inviting. Ms Artthi has attended to our hotel reservation. She was helpful and expedite in our check in. Mr Jimmy, Ms Javi and Mr Arbi are knowledgable and willing to share more hotel tips. Thumb up to you guys! During Stay : The request made on emails was well-noted. Everything was set up nicely. My child was very happy with the balloon , cake and birthday card. This make us feel valued as a GHA Member. Pacific Club Room is clean and spacious. It has an awesome view of MBS and CBD. Children's shower amenties were much appreciated. Rose was helpful and patient in leading us to our breakfast's table at Edge. Breakfast choice are aplenty. Facilties : Indoor playground : Preet is cordial.

title: short review about pan pacific hotel
desc: The environment and service of the hotel are great. The fly in the ointment is that when we checked in, there were 2 adults and 1 child. When we booked the room on the website, the agency told us that children can stay for free, but when we checked in, we found that we would need to pay an extra 100 SGD for an extra bed. In addition, the sheets and quilts in the room were very wet, and the sleeping experience was not very good.

title: An excelent choice.
desc: Luxurious and clean premises, polite and friendly staff, great food, amazing location and view, many facilities. Easy access to nearby mall and Suntec convention center without being exposed to the dreadful outside humidity. The price can be considered a bit steep.

title: Reliable and excellent
desc: Haven‚Äôt stayed here since pre Covid - nice to see some renovations have taken place since my last visit and service and comfort just as good. Always a safe bet with good staff , nice pool and fitness centre and one of the best breakfasts I have seen in any hotel world wide

title: Keyaki - Best Teppankayi (with Tommy - the best chef)
desc: The quality is very fresh especially the sashimi and beef. I love everything about this restaurant! Thank you chef Tommy for such a memorial experience! Best teppanyaki restaurant in Singapore! Highly recommend and I will definitely come again!

title: Highly recommended, Pan Pac Singapore.
desc: Concierge was great at the reception, we checked in hassle free. The bed was very comfortable and shower was very nice. We could rest very well. Room was also splendidly prepared. Breakfast at the Edge is definitely recommended!

title: Amazing Service by Ms POH LAN
desc: Was such a pleasant experience served by restaurant staff Ms POH LAN who was extremely approachable and friendly. Excellent service, Ms POH LAN was super attentive, service even better than HDL. Will come again with my family.

title: Love it
desc: The Pan Pacific hotel buffet is a culinary delight, and the Thai food section stole the show on Mother's Day! From aromatic curries to delectable stir-fried dishes, every bite transported me to Thailand. The flavors were perfectly balanced, and the authenticity of the dishes was impressive. I highly recommend experiencing the fantastic Thai food section at the Pan Pacific hotel buffet. Want to say Chef Mujib was very pleasant in his service

title: mother's day buffet dinner (:
desc: Had buffet dinner at Pan Pacific The Edge. Noticed there‚Äôs Thai food offering this time round, and my family enjoyed the food! We love our durian pengat and my chilli crab with mantou. Chef Mujib was very friendly and was very hospitable to us.

title: Fantastic
desc: Location is great and connected to malls nearby. Easy to look for eateries and shopping. The staff are very friendly and helpful. Hotel room is clean and very well maintained. The beds n pillows are comfortable.

title: Thankful for Poh Lan‚Äôs service
desc: Came for Mother‚Äôs Day buffet, we were served by Poh Lan, who is very attentive, friendly and prompt with her services. Gladly enjoyed our dining experience while she was serving us. Really made our overall dining experience a much more pleasant one couples with good food. Thank you Poh Lan!

title: Great hospitality and food!
desc: Food was good, especially the new Thai section. The chef there (Chef Mujib) was so patient in explaining the food items to us. The pineapple fried rice and the skewers were one of my favourites among the food I‚Äôve had tonight. Bravo!

title: Friendly, great food & ambience
desc: Thank you Kishore & Irlan for taking such good care of us during our time at Plume. They gave us such good recommendations for drinks & the food was amazing. We will definitely be back again. Their special in house cocktails were amazing

title: Wonderful set meal set in a lovely restaurant
desc: We ordered the Kaze set menu, which included sashimi as a starter, beef cubes, assorted seafood (salmon, scallops, prawns) and garlic fried rice. The food was absolutely delicious. The sashimi was fresh and thickly sliced, beef was cooked perfectly and garlic prawns were a standout. Special thanks to Chef Tommy Yeo for the food! Service was also very attentive, prompt and patient. Would highly recommend coming back for weekend dinner.

title: Great start for the evening
desc: Great service. Nice ambient. Good food quality. Friendly and helpful staff. Server is careful with order check back. Great place for gatherings. Been here few times for few gatherings. A good place for pampering yourself.

title: Great location with stunning views - Modern and clean
desc: Hotel is huge and was very crowded when we stayed. It was a holiday weekend. The rooms are as expected in a big city luxury hotel. We were able to get connecting rooms. I would not recommend having any children sleeping on the rounded couch, why did they make it rounded and narrow! Our 5 year old fell onto the floor during the night. They wanted to charge SGD 100 a night for a roll-away, which I'm not sure would have fit in the quite small room. Don't miss breakfast, best selection I have ever seen. Large stations for Japanese, Chinese, Indian, Western etc. High quality food, beautifully displayed. BUT, come early, the line to get into breakfast had 50+ in it by 9, only one poor person checking people in. Th hotel is attached to s shopping mall. If you want a quick

title: A Little Piece of Heaven
desc: This hotel is fantastic. It has wonderful facilities throughout coupled with friendly and helpful staff. There is an amazing choice at breakfast. Bedrooms are quiet with a large comfortable bed, very good lighting and everything you need from toothpaste to a safe. Some rooms have an amazing view of the Marina and sea. I was lucky and also had a balcony. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone who really wishes to enjoy their time in Singapore and experience a few days of peace and luxury.

title: Great Food, Excellent Service at Edge
desc: Had dinner at Edge. Been there many times over the years and as usual, it did not disappoint. Food was great with a wide variety of local and international selection. Excellent service too!!! Will definitely be back again.

title: Encouraged to try the Durian dessert.
desc: The overall experience was 9 out of 10. Great service, staff were friendly, exceptional variety of food for breakfast at The Edge. Dinner at Hai Tien Lo was superb. The beef cheeks were melt in your mouth. Apple our waitress was excellent I was sceptical about the Durian fruit dessert, but she encouraged us to try the Durian dessert. We did and it's was worth it, be brave! Great location for shops too. The only annoying part were the slow lifts and the bell sound when it arrived at your floor resonated in the open cavity. Not a surprise though given the number of levels/rooms. Would recommend highly and stay again

title: edge breakfast
desc: such a good breakfast, sally was an the food was super varied and gave a wide selection of breakfast across the world. The Indian and Chinese breakfast was absolutely delicious, and the omelette and egg station was great. Sally was super friendly and helpful throughout the meal! the bacon and continental breakfast was great as well and the fresh juice and fruit was lovely! 10/10 recommend

title: Lunch date with le husband!
desc: Great food (in particular the steamed prawns and laksa), and friendly and attentive servers. Sally was bubbly and cheerful, offered to help us take a picture, and was proactive in sharing with us what are some of her recommended food.

title: Friendly staff and personal service
desc: Great pool area plenty of shade and lounges Pool temperature not too cold Location was excellent Room was very comfortable with excellent facilities Very friendly staff Buffet breakfast was amazing

title: Great stay, with exceptional service
desc: I don‚Äôt normally write reviews but after my excellent experience at the pan pacific I was compelled to write about my experience. I was in Singapore for a quick 4 day work trip, I don‚Äôt normally stay at the Pan Pacific but it was last minute so I booked here. From checkin to checkout the staff at hotel made my experience super smooth and memorable. To start, on checkin the lady at the front desk was kind enough to upgrade my room when they ran out of king beds, a really nice gesture given I was very jet lagged from the trip. Throughout the stay the staff was helpful and friendly. The rooms themselves are comfortable and the location very central. I couldn‚Äôt not recommend the pan pacific more. Thanks to all the staff for making the experience as smooth as possible!

title: Great staff attitude ......
desc: The stay is excellent.Also the staff JunYun who is handling the dragon boat nonya dumplings is extremely helpful......i personally went back for more after the 26 june which is after the festival.he managed to get 10 more for me for my family members who are coming in from Perth and have not eaten thr dumplings for ages.

title: Service excellence coupled with great food
desc: Edge is a great place to gather for a meal with friends or family. Good variety of cuisine types. Pretty large range. Customer service was really good. A server that I would like to highlight is Shasha. She has a cheerful disposition and was eager to see to our needs. She anticipated our needs and was there to help us with our requests. A lovely, warm and cheerful lady even though our group was always asking for one thing or another. A true show of excellent and professional customer service.

title: Good service at Hai Tien Lo
desc: Food at Hai Tien Lo was good and the service staff very professional. Shout out to Genevieve, Samuel, Xiao Lin and Apple. Great ambience too. All my guests like the foid, its presentation and the attentiveness of the wait staff.üôÇ

title: Fantastic buffet lunch at Edge, Pan Pacific
desc: Best buffet lunch in town, good spread of salad, fish n beef n good pork ribs. Great Indian food n Roast meats n laksa.New menu of Thai cuisine too. Nice desserts . We were there a group of 6 celebrating a Birthday. On 23 june. We were very well served by Sally Koh who was very knowledgable n friendly n the whole team provide great service, special mention Grace who attended to our table

title: Wonderful dining experience at The Edge
desc: Excellent service rendered by Rose from the Edge. Rose was highly professional, serve with a smile and goes the extra mile in ensuing that our needs are well taken care of. Special thanks to Ying as well for rendering excellence service to our family.

title: SHASHA IS AWESOME!!
desc: Shasha is an amazing waitress!! I like her attitude and tone, it‚Äôs super awesome and entertaining. She‚Äôs super friendly and nice, I like the way she always smiles and looks like she‚Äôs enjoying her job! It makes me feel happy and welcomed! Overall one of the bestest waitress I have encountered yet! Such a nice person, I hope to meet more people like her!

title: Best service
desc: Excellent! The food is delicious! Manager and chef are friendly and helpful. The staff/waiter Ms Shasha and Ms Rose are very helpful. We requested for birthday cake, less than 5 minutes she prepare the cake and help us celebrate the birthday!

title: A wonderful dinner for regular guests of Hai Tien Lo
desc: I find one of your serving waiter Patrick Tan who is experienced in recommending unique dishes to us so that we not feel bored since we are regular to Hai Tien Lo.. He is patient and also polite during his service despite my 2 elderly seniors .. keep up the good work

title: good buffet place
desc: Venga was extremely friendly and polite. He went for the extra mile to serve us to ensure are needs and wants are met. Good buffet place to dine in and friendly staff! Would recommend this place for everyone

title: Edge buffet and service
desc: Great hotel set up for longer business stays. Large rooms with good bedding and closet space. The absolute highlight was the breakfast and specifically the server - Sally. Sally fun and attentive, really going above to bond with us and make breakfast something to look forward to. Would recommend to future corporate clients purely on her service.

title: Food Service - good
desc: Warmed welcome by staff Sally, given us a 'introduction' tour for the lunch buffet. Very helpful. Commentable. Spacious sitting, has privacy for conversation. Attentive staff frequently visited table to remove food ware.

title: Plume‚Äôn good time
desc: Went to Plume, a cozy bar with cocktails inspired by the avifauna of SG. Served by Meur who whipped two solid cocktails up. Bar is relatively new at 3 months in but the bartenders carry the craft and maturity of a seasoned drinking hole. Cheers!

title: Great stay
desc: The room was comfortable and spacious but lacked a real wardrobe. Bathroom was well appointed and all in all the hotel was lovely. A shuttle between City Hall MRT and the hotel would be a great addition.

title: Business trip
desc: Rooms are comfortable and clean and some rooms come with a small balcony with great views to the marina. The breakfast buffet is excellent, choice and quality. Fresh fruit juices, eggs Benedict, yogurts, tasty pain aux chocolat, bee honey, and much more. The hotel is in walking distance to the promenade and connected to the mall as well. Check out is quick and uncomplicated. Only little downside was the gym, it could get an upgrade in size and variety of equipment.

title: Extremely disappointing!
desc: We had stayed here previously on two occasions and could hardly believe it was the same place! First impressions - reception was atrocious - dysfunctional, slow & inexperienced staff. We had booked a newly renovated deluxe club room - don't know who their architect was or what he was thinking. could only be appropiate for a single person staying overnight! It had hanging space ( not in wardrobe ) for about 5 items, no drawers, and room for one suitcase in storage area. We had booked 4 nights and were traveling overseas for over a month. After complaining we were assigned an older room which at least had wardrobe space and drawers - we were then left to our own devices, hopefully forgotten - nothing in bar fridge, no coffee or tea or milk, only supplied bottled water each day.

title: Located near Marina Square and Suntec City
desc: Have stayed at this hotel for a few times. The hotel is currently undergoing renovation. Accessible to Marina Square, Suntec City and MBS. Love the bubble lift with view of the city area. The newly refurbished room is pretty nice. Great breakfast with many varieties.

title: Excellent
desc: Our trip was almost perfect, my only wish is that breakfast was included. The room and the rest of the hotel is clean and the staff were great. Location was close to everything. I won‚Äôt mind coming back to Pan Pacific Hotel for another wonderful experience.

title: 10 July 2023
desc: We had a really great time. Putra and Meor are amazing bartender and really fun to talk to. They made this experience extra special Would go again for sure Great cocktails, it was super fun to try the green ant gin cocktail

title: Great stay
desc: Great hotel with extremely impeccable service and we were greatly taken care of by both Mariana and Siti during the duration of our stay. Room was spacious and clean with the only slight complaint being amenities were not always refilled.

title: Worthless
desc: We travel singapore üá∏üá¨ to celebrate my birthday and tried too book best property and found pan pacific But unfortunately when we visited stayed found it not satisfactory 1st I requested for special request on my birthday celebration for a cake/or champagne staff denied for it on (1st july) they don‚Äôt bother even to wish 2nd I found rooms r very small there not even a proper space to keep luggage too and no space for extra bedding 3 service is very poor 4 higly overpriced 5 staff has to time to listen guests 6 indian food menu at breakfast is very limited and all day repeated same Overall money waste

title: A Phenomenal Stay at an Inviting Hotel
desc: I had a wonderful stay at the Pan Pacific. I love the ambiance of the hotel and the overall design of the lobby. The inviting seats in the Atrium, the exclusivity of the dining pods in the back, the transparent floor to ceiling elevators, and the calming vibes of the palm trees. My room was small but comfortable and had all the amenities I needed - plush slippers, TWG teabags, Nespresso machine, Balmain toiletries, and a great view of the city. Housekeeping was mostly consistent in replenishing towels, tea + coffee, and water (but not toiletries) and kept my room clean for the duration of my stay. There was initial confusion about whether or not breakfast was included in my package, but the manager at Edge was kind enough to comp me for the first breakfast buffet at Edge. I

title: Worst service
desc: Worst service ever had in a 5 star hotel. Room service simple plate, spoon and ice bucket waiting for last 1 hour. Location wise excellent. Oh I just got my order. Veiw feom room is good that didn't allow me to give 1 star.

title: Great experience at Pan Pacific Singapore
desc: Perfect location near tourist spots, bus stops, and major shopping centers. It made exploring the city a breeze. The team created a home-like experience for us, and the personal touches were greatly appreciated. My daughter especially enjoyed the graduation welcome treat, which made us feel truly welcome. The Premier Marina Bay Room was fantastic, offering breathtaking views of Marina Bay and the Singapore skyline. The inner courtyard's majestic interiors added to the property's amazing design. The breakfast spread was irresistible, and we particularly loved the pastries and breakfast pizza. We left the table feeling delightfully satisfied and ready for the day. The dinner buffet at the Edge was a delightful treat, although we regret not being able to dine at Keyaki as we had

title: Great views
desc: A lovely hotel to stay in. We had a marina bay view and the rooms were a good size. The club upstairs has great views and Sharon who works there really looked after us. The only thing we would change would be at the arrival and departure we weren‚Äôt helped with our luggage and our taxi driver even commented on this.

title: Great experience
desc: Very clean hotel and the staff is very friendly and eager to assist. The check in and check out queuing is very time consuming although they have someone asking the queuing guests if they can assist in other enquiries. The rooms is beautiful and the beds is out of this world. The rates to me is way too high but again not much higher than other hotels in the area.

title: Good Hotel, Good Location , its good for Family vacation
desc: This hotel service is very good, the location is very good, close to the MRT station, close to Marina Bay. Highly recommended for a family hotel in Singapore, The swimming pool is quite good for children, although for adults it is a bit too shallow.

title: Stay at Pan Pacific Singapore
desc: Pan Pacific Singapore is very close to everything. I really recommend it if you are traveling alone. Staff is so nice. Rooms are clean and provide many amenities. You have many options of restaurants, pool is really good. I will come back.

title: I dont recommend for those look for details and quality
desc: Rooms and corridors are smelling mold most probably because of very old building Extremely careless staff No hospitality sense at all Nice location,connected with a shopping mall. I dont think i will come again

title: A solid business hotel stay
desc: Pan Pacific is a solid hotel that‚Äôs in the process of a positive upgrade. It‚Äôs focus is very clearly on the business traveller. The rooms are well appointed and fairly big l, as it‚Äôs an older hotel, and the ground floor revamp is showing that it‚Äôs still a quality location and stay. Room improvements in decor, especially club level rooms, would be a good change, but it‚Äôs otherwise a very clean and comfortable hotel in a good central location. Breakfast is vast in terms of options and it‚Äôs all good quality. Staff are friendly and professional.

title: Expected more.
desc: My first visit to Singapore and first ever stay in a Pan Pacific Hotel so I was really looking forward to my 3 night stay after 13 nights island hopping around Indonesia. First impressions were good, check in was faultless and we were up in our room in no time. The room was great, very spacious, great bathroom with amazing shower and the bed was very comfortable, with a city view over Singapore skyline. I noticed on my first morning that the duvet was torn, we hadn‚Äôt done it and thought housekeeping would change it as it was quite frayed, but no the room was serviced and bed made up with torn duvet, not great for a supposedly 5* hotel. On our last day the duvet was eventually changed but we were left with only one robe and no hand soap, but a vanity box and clothes brush

title: Great experience at The Edge
desc: My husband and I celebrated our 40th wedding anniversary with a dinner at Pan Pacific‚Äôs The Edge buffet and we had such an enjoyable and pleasant experience. We were served by Xylyn and her hospitable and professional service elevated our special evening. She was attentive and thoughtful, and we thoroughly enjoyed the impeccable service and food. I‚Äôd highly recommend The Edge!

title: HoneyMoon trip
desc: Overall it was a good experience and ambience for our honeymoon trip. We forgot to make a small request to set the room for our honeymoon such as swan pillows and red Rose petals lined up in heart shape.

title: Great Experience!
desc: Buffet was great. Sally had attended to us during lunch service today. Sally's service is very nice and friendly! The buffet spread was good and fresh. I will definitely recommend all to come and visit this establishment.

title: Excellent 5 star hotel with a Club Pacific room and access to the 39th floor Club Lounge
desc: We stayed in a Pacific Club room. A great experience with very large well equipped rooms, free soft drinks in the mini bar, excellent range of food in the top floor Club lounge. Close to major shopping centres and eateries

title: The Edge Buffet Restaurant
desc: Visited The Edge buffet restaurant in Pan Pacific. Had the best birthday celebration with our group of friends. One of the waitress, Shasha had definitely make our day even wonderful. She had been so patience with us for our indecisive decision of whether to take up the unlimited beverages package and help us with all enquires & request. Thank you so much and keep it up. I will definitely re-visit The Edge.

title: Efficient and friendly staff
desc: Lovely hotel well located with great service. Staff are attentive and efficient. Breakfast at the edge is great with a big choice in cuisine. Connected to the Marina Mall and the Ritz Carlton hotel. Walking distance from the sands convention center where our meetings were held and very convenient. Easy access to Suntel mall with many dining options, fountain of wealth and shops.

title: Keyaki
desc: Remembered many good things about Keyaki from decades ago. Great, attentive service by Chef Tommy Yeo, who took care of the whole family. Proactive, entertaining and understanding. Keep it up. Thank you. We will be back!

title: Great birthday celebration at Keyaki
desc: I brought my parents to Keyaki for my Mum's birthday celebration. We were served by Jeff and Nicole, who were extremely friendly and attentive. Jeff was also a great photographer - we left the restaurant with many nice pictures of the celebration and memories. Thanks Keyaki team for the hospitality!

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: The Hotel was excellent , very clean and the location was the best. Near to most interesting places. The breakfast included everything and it was one of the most tasteful breakfast which we had. The staff was polite and friendly. When we travel again to Singapore this will be again our hotel!!

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: Upon arrival room wasn‚Äôt ready which wasn‚Äôt big issue cos we were going out anyway.. but then after we came back found issue with the lift .. we were trying to go to the club lounge but the lift only went up to 33floor and not 38 floor club lounge and then went down to 1st floor and up again and delayed our time for afternoon tea. Upon arrival to the room the minibar was locked and extra bed that we requested was not sent up. Birthday decorations could be improved

title: Wonderful Pan pacific moment
desc: In room dining experience was great. The staff by the name of Niroshan, who serve me my in room dining meal was friendly and helpful. Always having a smile on him. Club lounge at level 38 was on another level of greatness. Their view was awesome, food and drinks were great as well. Staff also displayed pleasant and great service with a smile on them all the time. Breakfast at Edge restaurant was awesome, offering a wide variety of food and drinks. Me and my family has a great morning breakfast moment.

title: Must stay
desc: Outstanding Hotel with great connectivity to everything i needed Great Breakfast Wonderful Bar Supercool pool Room were superb Must visit for business and leisure travellers and experience the hotel at its best

title: Great food
desc: Tommy served up a delightful Kaze meal for us, while Suresh was excellent in his service throughout. Tommy has great experience working in hotels and also internationally, and it shows through his food

title: Great all round package & experience
desc: Great venue ,great food & great service. . Good Gym will definitely return Pool was a bit warm for my liking members lounge exceeded expectations for service & quality . Bed was huge .We stayed on the 35 floor with exceptional views

title: Great experience!
desc: Tommy Yeo was very friendly and attentive to our needs! Food was very tasty and it was an enjoyable experience. We were celebrating a family occasion and the service staff went above and beyond for us.

title: TERRIBLE STAY AT PAN PACIFIC !!!! POOR STANDARDS
desc: I traveled with my family to singapore and stayed at pan pacific from 2nd june to 4th june,2023. It was a family trip, and i was traveling with my 2 kids. I had 4 big luggage, 2 cabinet trolley, and 1 stroller for my small baby. As soon as we took a drop at the hotel, we were greeted by a horrible experience as the bellboy (mr. Mutthu) at the gate greeted us by saying, and i quote why have you bought so much luggage ? Me and my wife were totally shocked at such a welcome from the hotel staff. We also brought this matter to the knowledge of the manager, but no action was taken against thesaid staff. Secondly, pan pacific is a big hotel, and they have touch panel intercoms to ask for some basic services. To my utter dismay, we had to place repeated attempts to even ask for water

title: First visit
desc: I tried out this place because it‚Äôs new. Great service by Meor! I like the drink he recommended, try ‚ÄòThe orange bellied flowerpecker! It‚Äôs light & fruity! For finger food, I recommend the ‚Äòperged together‚Äô. Nice ambience and great service , will come back again

title: Wonderful dinner
desc: Had a wonderful dinner with my wife. All foods tasted great, especially the seafood! Great service as well, they keep asking us for our needs and serve us with drinks and clean utensils. Will definitely be back next time.

title: Extremely well located comfortable accommodation
desc: Very clean and comfortable. Handy for Bugis MRT who means you can get anywhere easily and cheaply! Staff at reception very pleasant and helpful . It was great to be able to extend our checkout to enable us to have a day out in the city before heading to the airport suitably showered and changed.

title: DINING AT KEYAKI
desc: Enjoyed my dining experience at Keyaki thanks to Jeff who had served us to his best ability. Service was top notched and everything was catered for nicely. Jeff was very friendly and understanding to our needs as well.

title: Superb location and ambiance
desc: Great location and surrounding views. Ambiance was tranquil. Friendly hotel staffs and very helpful. Make me feel appreciated. Very near to connecting MRT stations, so easy to go anywhere in Singapore. Can see the Marina bay and harbor from my room.

title: Wonderful Staycation
desc: Brought my family for a staycation over the long weekend. Despite the crowds, Pan Pacific managed to make it a wonderful experience at all touch points. Queues at the check-in were well and politely handled. Edge staff were so friendly and welcoming to my children even though we were there just to get ice cream and candy bags (included in our room package), and gave the parents (husband and myself) free dessert treats. Very lovely and thoughtful indeed. The staff at Pacific Club were exceptional too. A small hiccup as the bathtub water would not fully drain, but a call to the service centre and the technician was in our room and fixed it, all in less than 15 minutes. Special mention to housekeeping, especially due to the very warm and kindly Chinese lady taking care of our

title: Complimentary to Chef Ethan @ Edge.
desc: I had a wonderful experience previous visit to Edge and brought my family to dine at Edge. I am really glad that service & food at Edge did not fail my expectation and my family had a great time dining and being served by friendly & knowledgeable staff especially with Chef Ethan who recommended tomahawk steak & trimmings. Indeed, the steak was sliced to right thickness and was tender & juicy to taste. Strongly recommended to try! Great job!

title: Amazingly good experience
desc: Best service at keyaki. By server Jeff, very attentive. Best service for my husband bday and they really attend to detail. Jeff helped prep for mini bday sliced cake and my husband enjoyed. I would recommend for people to come here for any occasion and have Jeff as main server!

title: Good experience
desc: Good spread of food at edge, good service and delicious food. Enjoyed the fresh cold fresh seafood. My family had enjoyed the dinning experience at edge. Special thanks to Chef Ethan and Rose for their excellent service.

title: Great experience with Chef Ethan at Edge
desc: Wide selection of food from Asian to Western which is really good. Really enjoyed the food and great service by Chef Ethan. Tomohawk steak is very delicious and we loved it very much. Also to highlight Rose who is helpful and provides good service.

title: Highly disappointing..very poor services
desc: Very poor services ..staying in room no 2407 & 2408...booked room for whopping 500 singapore dillars ...but room service is pathetic ..they are not concerned about their guests...ask for ice & water ... after 45 min room service guys say we are busy serving paid room service orders only ....pan Pacific management must understand we all guest staying in their property have already paid for their services ....not serving guest with water & ices because they are busy shows they poorly equipped with manpower...really disappointing...pls think before booking they only charge for 5 star service but they don't provide them...only interest is to get more & more money from guests...highly disappointing !!!

title: Amazing Breakfast with SALLY
desc: Such a fantastic hotel but I have to highlight, I LOVED going to breakfast with the server - Sally. Sally went above and beyond for our table, matched out fun energy and kept up with service for our large table.

title: Pleasant City Stay
desc: Great service across all departments and locations we went to in the hotel. Every staff we encountered was pleasant, friendly and had a smile on their face. Encountered a few hiccups with a handful of issues faced in the hotel but most were resolved by concierge and guest services.

title: A luxurious hotel experience
desc: Very high standard in terms of service and food. We were treated as if our stay was very important to staff who could not have been more helpful, courteous and perhaps most important, friendly. Our flight meant that we arrived in the morning and were not due to check in until later for that night. We were told that we could have our luggage stored and that we could remain in the hotel until check in time. In the event we were offered access to our room early and this meant so much to very weary travellers.

title: Great service and experience
desc: Great service and interesting drinks! Was served by Meur. He was very attentive to my every requests and friendly. Ambience is great too for deep conversations. Not much selection on the food though since it is more like a bar

title: Compliments to Chef Eric and Chef Tommy of Keyaki
desc: Eric Yong and Tommy Yeo were super friendly and food without saying was super awesome. The beef was perfectly done and the garlic fried rice was full of bursting flavours. Lobster was fresh and succulent with the perfect flavours from teppanyaki. Highly recommend! üëçüèøüëçüèøüëçüèø

title: Select the Pacific Club Select Studio
desc: Best bathtub ever in the Pacific Club Select Studio... can fit the whole family. My daughter enjoyed the Pacific Club experience, jungle village, activities on L4 and the pool. Chill longer in the room with nice and reasonably priced room service and complimentary drinks in the room... save a trip to the restaurant.

title: Nice hotel but could be better in some areas
desc: Slight confusion on check-in regarding GHA Titanium double upgrade limitations and was told the limit was capped at Skyline Suite. On the other hand, I was told by the reservation officer over the phone that there was no fixed limit and the double upgrade benefit is applicable for any rooms subject to availability. This was eventually settled and we were given the Pan Pacific Suite, which was a pleasant experience. A point to note was that the staff kept addressing me by the wrong name (probably the previous guest that stayed) through the in-room phone despite telling them multiple times; this definitely left a sour note and shows the lack of communication between the team. Housekeeping staff were attentive and provided good service, but missed out some corners of the room

title: Superb experience!
desc: The rooms are well-maintained. The shower facilities come with toiletries. We love the room layout, its friendly for children. The pool was nice and its next to a children indoor playground which my boys loved to go to! If you are looking for a place to refresh and recharge, its a go to place for you!

title: Wont be the first choice of hotel at Marina area
desc: Took super long to check in. By looking at my identity card in front & still got my name wrong. Can‚Äôt find my booking. Deluxe Panoramic room is not worth the value paid. Breakfast buffet has nice spree. But staff like chasing customers away. We went to collect our food for the 2nd serving. Our unfinished coffee, our table been cleaned up and been placed with other hotel guests.

title: Good and approachable buffet staff - Poh Lan
desc: Hi, good food and great service. Would like to acknowledge buffet staff- Poh Lan for her warm services and approachable attitude. She was efficient and clearing up used plates and utensils promptly. She also recommended nice foods in the buffet which we may have missed out. Thumbs up for her.

title: Plume! A must to visit!
desc: Visit the newly opened plume and it was super amazing and a very lovely place! Amazing drinks and great food that paired beautifully! Kudos to the team as well! Very hospitable and knowledgeable. Definitely gonna visit again and again!!

title: Dinner at Keyaki
desc: Lovely ambience paired with great food and dining experience by the excellent service of both Jeff and Liz Fugu mirin was really nice and the musk melon was exceptional! Nothing like this tasted before

title: Enjoyable staycation
desc: Great service from all the staffs throughout my staycation. In room dining service is excellent. However, they are a little bit salty though. Housekeeping staffs are very friendly and they did a good job cleaning my room during my stay.

title: Keyaki recommended
desc: Lovely experience at keyaki! Teppanyaki was great and service chef Tommy Yeo has excellent customer service ! Entertaining and friendly! Set meal was value for money! Would recommend this to family and friends

title: A memorable lunch at Keyaki restaurant Ô∏è
