We sat at the teppanyaki counter and it was a great experience with chef Eric yong.had the premium teppanyaki set and the beef teppanyaki was so good. He asked if it‚Äôs our first time here and we told him it‚Äôs for one of my friend‚Äôs 30th birthday celebration. He told suresh and they surprised us with a cake after we were done . Wasn‚Äôt expecting it as I didn‚Äôt mentioned beforehand in my reservation. Great experience

title: Keyaki at Pan Pacific
desc: The Teppanyaki at Keyaki is nice. Chef Eric Yong is friendly and the food is really nice. Highly recommended and will definitively come back here again for the food. Really great experience. Must try their lobster and the wagyu beef. It is superbly great! Service by both Chef Eric and Suresh is excellent!

title: Impeccable service and great food
desc: We were served by Poh Lan who was one of the most attentive waitresses we have ever seen. You'll always see her looking for empty plates to clear and she always says thank you for every plate she cleared. She is highly attentive and careful, super friendly and hardworking! Food was great with a good selection, although I think special dates and weekends will tend to have more variety. Quality of food is great and my family and I had a great time.

title: Best of Luxury
desc: ABHI at the front desk is a true gem of the property. His warmth and professionalism exceeded my expectations. Every interaction was met with genuine smile and a willingness to go above and beyond. The experience that has left me with cherished memories. I‚Äôm eagerly anticipating the chance to return to this slice of luxury.

title: cocktails at the poolside
desc: Great hotel - loved the pool, and poolside restaurant (especially the pina coladas !). Slightly cramped bedroom for three of us, and we weren't aware that kids at 13 have to pay the full cost, but after discussion they allowed our 13 year old to have the extra bed in the room.

title: Elegant Japanese food, highly recommend
desc: We received impeccable service by Jasper, he is very observant and helpful as we wanted to change a few dishes in the set menu. The food was delicious and plating is very elegant. Environment is very zen with a beautiful mini garden outside. Highly recommend this place!

title: Wonderful dining experience
desc: Food was good, service was great and we had a truly enjoyable meal! Wei Jian in particular went the additional mile to meet our needs and when we requested for a slight change in meal, it was well provided.

title: Fantastic Buffet Dinner at Edge
desc: Abundance of food options, delicious food, impeccable service and feel-good music for one to eat to the beat! Edge is now my favourite buffet place in Singapore. Special thanks to Lugan and the servers for my table for their attentive and kind service.

title: Great service
desc: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay , the service was fabulous , especially in the Edge restaurant. Lugan and Chan Gee Moi service was exceptional. We had breakfast every day of our stay the above staff always made us feel welcome.

title: Really underwhelming and some cleanliness issues
desc: Dirty and underwhelming. original room smelled terribly. went back to front desk to be moved and they acknowledged that specific room has had bad amel problems in the past?!? It smelled overwhelmingly like mold. Second room smelled less but was dirty (large amounts of grime and dust accumulated underneath the bed - as though it had not been vacuumed in over a year. and other issues like badly stained carpets in common areas etc. Upside: Front desk staff were courteous and breakfast buffet was good. Left midway through our stay at Pan Pacific to go to the Mandarin Oriental and it was fantastic. For the $$, would absolutely recommend the mandarin oriental over the Pan Pacific.

title: good hotel, excellent Plume bar & spa
desc: In general it was a good hotel. the restaurant and the Plume bar was divine. spa was excellent. I booked a double bed but they gave me 2 singles saying there weren't any left. the rooms were very humid even the bed was damp. overall good experience.

title: Head to The Edge for a spectacular view (of yummy food)!
desc: It was lunchtime when I had the priviledge of dining here. The place was roomy and comfortable, with ample space between tables (i sat at the tables with sofa seating). Lovely spread of local and international food served by a team of very attentive kitchen and serving crew! Here‚Äôs a call out to Lugan and Alice for treating by daughter the delicious slice of birthday cake!

title: Family getaway
desc: Only 3 staff at reception. I was in Queue for abt 20min. Room is new and clean.The only fault i cant find rm service menu in the room and toilet has no blind the glass can see through frm the room. Were they for my birthday, no amenities arrange, cant fault cos I didn‚Äôt ask for it. Taught the hotel will notice and surprised me. All staff we met frm doorman, st gregory staff and the senior who usher us at breakfast were friendly. Special mention to Abhi & TJ frm front office were friendly. Hotel facilities is good for family.

title: 1 night staycation
desc: Had 1 night staycay at their refurbished hotel. Was greeted by Abhi & he assisted with the check-in. Abhi was very pleasant & offered us a refurbished room facing Marina Bay! Got a room on the 21st floor overlooking the MBS & it‚Äôs amazing especially at night with the city lights. Really enjoyed my stay here. Thank you for your assistance Abhi! Truly appreciate it! ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Top notch service and food ü•≥
desc: I was served by Hiro, fantastic chef. Throughout the Omakase experience he was really professional and also friendly despite the slight cultural differences. Overall we are very satisfied with his service and food. Highly recommended!

title: Great experience
desc: Went for a celebration dinner with colleagues. Have to say, am amaze with the food varieties offered. Lugan also provided prompt service and was attentive to details. Highly recommend and would visit again.

title: Wonderful dining experience!
desc: Had a wonderful birthday tepanyaki dinner at Keyaki. Chef Eric is the man to go to for tepanyaki. His special golden sauce prawn is to die for. Our server Jasper is also very attentive n helpful. Always making sure my tea cup is always full. Definitely coming back for sure.

title: Great location - but not exactly 5 star worthy
desc: The opinions and reviews here are purely based on my experience. Feel free to use this review to guide or assist you in your hotel of choice. My partner and I booked a 1 night stay at the club room which had a gorgeous view of the Marina Bay Area and access to the club lounge. Check in was efficient (someone will be on scene to guide you to the respective counters) and you could even do it online before arrival. The club room was spacious and had a great view of Marina Bay. I do have some reservations about the room which I will elaborate below The afternoon tea session was held at the club lounge at level 38. They had a wide selection of snacks and there was even a server who went around to introduce the tea of the day. My partner and I definitely felt good about the whole

title: Good location and value for money
desc: A well situated hotel with good views of the marina and marina bay hotel The breakfast offered a really wide range of choice - but were extremely quick to close at 10.30am The room was of good quality having recently been refurbished , albeit a little small. Does take a little getting used to getting in and out of the hotel after a sight seeing day out

title: A Quality Bar in Singapore that You Shouldn't Miss!
desc: I visited the PLUME at Pan Pacific Singapore on 03.08.2023. It was a very chic bar newly renovated and reopened about 2 months ago. Excellent bar specializes in some very cool cocktails and a good selection of spirits. Great bar tenders and friendly staff who provide quality services and personal touches that make you feel you are well cared and looked after. Good selection of bar food specially its cold cut & cheese platter. Well represented and carried the quality brand of Pan Pacific. You must try it if you have not already done so.

title: Amazing experience
desc: Food is great and we have the loveliest server, Sha Sha, who was cheery and made amazing conversations with us. She was also really attentive to clearing the tables, asking us how was the food and making sure we were well taken care of.

title: Birthday at pan pacific
desc: Shades was very friendly and accommodating!! The food was amazing and we will definitely return for another event! The spread was exactly what we wanted for my fianc√©e birthday will return 100% thank you

title: Nothing less from pan pacific
desc: Hotel room came with the restaurant 's wedding package. It was a King sized bed. Room was spacious and well fitted. Showers were clean. The hotel accomodated all our requests and the staff from the porters to the reception were polite and pleasant. It was a wonderful wedding at pan pacific

title: Another Great National Day Stay!
desc: Thanks to the hardworking team, had another great 2023 National Day staycation =) Even though the celebrations were held further away at the padang this year, fireworks and flypast were still visible in the bay facing rooms as well as in the pacific club lounge (bay facing seats). Special thanks to Midori san for the smooth check in despite the crazy queue on a public holiday!

title: Wonderful food and ambience!
desc: We went as a group of 3 girls to celebrate a birthday and Jeff showed us to our seats. When our food arrived, he explained what each food was and how to best enjoy them. The food was absolutely delicious and the ambience made us feel like we were in Japan. Jeff even presented us with a little complimentary birthday cake! Really loved the experience here and will definitely come back again.

title: Excellent Customer Service
desc: We stayed 12 wonderful nights in the Pan Pac Singapore. While there a few initial kinks with our rooms, all hotel representatives were most responsive and rectified them promptly and made our stay very comfortable indeed. Special appreciation to Amanda the duty manager who provided personalized attention to my family‚Äôs needs as we came down with an unexpected illness‚Äîthe care and thoughtfulness was much appreciated, a true reflection of the professionalism of the hotel staff and Singapore‚Äôs hospitality. We stayed 12 days and still could not eat our way through the entire buffet spread! We bring back fond memories of our stay in

title: Excellent service
desc: Went to Edge for lunch with my family and was very impressed with the service. The lady serving our section by the name of Sally was very attentive and helpful. She anticipated our needs well and proactively provided us with all we need to make a wonderful dining experience. Strongly recommended as a great family restaurant.

title: Great Night Out
desc: Had a great time at the new bar, Plume. Great cocktails and service from Putra and Irlan. Ambiance is great and the place wasn't too crowded. Great place to chill and hangout while being able to chat. I will definitely be back!

title: Disappointing stay at Pan Pacific
desc: Check in and registration take longer than expectations. Only 3 counters available when queueing. No complimentary drink to customers queueing for so long. Message pan pacific few times to request for high level in the end get the lowest level 5 floor blocked view. title: Amazing wedding venue and hospitality!
desc: We had our wedding here at the Pan Pacific Singapore Hotel and the experience was amazing!! The team were very helpful and they took care of us very well. The location was accessible for our guests and the service provided by the banquet staff were amazing! Special shoutout to Vasant, Ramli and Aidil who made sure that our wedding experience is awesome and memorable! Will definitely come back again for staycations!

title: Fantastic hotel for access to the marina and city
desc: This is our 2nd stay at this amazing hotel after staying here 15 years ago on our honeymoon. Now we took the kids. It‚Äôs been updated recently and feels fresh. The rooms we stayed in (overlooking the marina bay) felt newly refurbished with large beds, a large seating area and a balcony (the balcony is very shallow and really for standing in not so where to sit and dwell). The bathroom is large and well fitted. The central lobby and restaurants were good. The bar has a very sophisticated vibe - worth a drink or two. The pool is smaller than you may think but never felt crowded with beds generally available. The gym is well equipped and again not too crowded. Spa seems to be shut which was a shame. Overall is a great ambassador to the brand and we have stayed in their London branch

title: good hotel
desc: the room was too small, the room service was too expensive. there were no bathroom slippers provided. connected to a mall with a supermarket. great view. easy access to everything. The property is very clean and nice. carpets on the room floors are dated.

title: Edge Restaurant
desc: absolutely grateful and impressed with the service by Chef Ethan. my 1yo son has life threatening food allergy to eggs & dairy. i approached the pasta counter to find out if the dishes displayed there had any of the allergens. one of the employee then approached chef Ethan to assist. Ethan went through thoroughly with me every dish displayed alongside the pasta station. as i moved on to the chinese food section, he surprised me by coming over to inform me which dishes were safe and unsafe for my kid consume - this highlighted his observation skills and how he genuinely tries to help every customer. overall, service was great & we enjoyed ourselves. even my kid enjoyed the food though selection was limited for him. i hope that pan pacific can consider listing the allergens

title: Excellent
desc: Excellent service from Mira Sulaiman, we had a small issue on check and Mira dealt with it brilliantly, would recommend the hotel as its close to the all the tourist attraction .the rooms were of good size and cleaned to a very high standards , the breakfast was good with a huge variety

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: Staff were friendly and approachable from the elderly staff whom greeted us upon arrival right to the housekeeper. The room was a little musky smelling when we entered. Pool was so much fun that we swam twice during our stay. Check-in was brief although we had to wait a little and check-out was prompt. Appreciate that Natasha gave birthday greetings at the reception and we appreciate the cake and card gesture in the room. In awe of the architectural design of the hotel.

title: Amazing hotel
desc: Pan Pacific was 10 out of 10 in every way. We were on the 11th floor in a premier room with Marina Bay views. What views they were! Perfect location. Fantastic room with comfortable bed and amazing pillows. The breakfast was first class and the choices were the best we have EVER had in any hotel. The staff were first class, so friendly and welcoming and nothing was too much trouble. We would üíØ recommend this hotel.

title: edge buffet breakfast
desc: I had a great time during my stay in Pan Pacific SG especially the breakfast in Edge is awesome, food is amazing, they had a wide variety kinds of food and like to commend Ms Janice Chan, who assisted us is very helpful, accomodating and efficient. I would definitely recommend it to my family and friends. üòÑ

title: fabulous location, great hotel
desc: The Pan Pacific is an excellent hotel in which to stay if you are visiting Singapore. The location is fabulous, very central and close to most landmarks. Staff, food snd facilities - all very good indeed. Except for a few teething difficulties I would recommend this hotel to anyone.

title: Service quality let down by room cleanliness
desc: Service quality of hotel staff was generally good. Areas for improvement include the overall room cleanliness, as well as the waiting time during checking in and out. Buffet spread and variety could be better too.

title: Awesome and friendly team
desc: Had dinner at the Edge restaurant. Its a international buffet restaurant that serve wide selection of food. Really enjoyed the food and service provided. Special thanks to chef mujib for the explaination and suggestion of food. We did really enjoyed every single food that been recommended. Not to forget the service crew, steven,venga and khloe. They were very attentive by keep giving service (cleaning,topping up drinks,checking on food quality) throughout the night. Will definitely come again. Thanks once again team. Well done!!!

title: Excellent
desc: Excellent service from the moment you approach the glass door to the hotel. Greeted warmly by the staff. One staff in particular for the Edge, Janice remembers me even after a year. Yearly stay at the hotel for the F1 season. She greets with a genuine warmth.

title: It‚Äôs a wonderful experience dining at edge
desc: Staff are friendly, especially an auntie with the name of Ng Poh Lan, she‚Äôs friendly and attentive. Wonderful experience. The food are nice as well, will definitely come back again, good job edge team

title: Saturday brunch
desc: We enjoyed a great Saturday brunch with friends. The service was very attentive and we thoroughly enjoyed each dish. Our favourites were the sashimi and teppanyaki dishes. The walk through the garden over the coy pond is a lovely start to the meal.

title: Compliment!
desc: Ng Poh Lan served us well during our visit to Pan Pacific Hotel @ Edge :) Enjoyed the food here and the service was excellent. Would recommend this restaurant to everyone who is visiting Pan Pacific..

title: Superb service by Jeff at Keyaki
desc: Jeff was very attentive, he noticed that my wife was pregnant and immediately brought over a pillow for back support. He gave us good food recommendations and we really liked the quality food and overall service, will come back very soon.

title: Dinner at Keyaki
desc: Dinner at Keyaki with the best service from Jeff. He was pleasant, friendly, and attentive. The food was delicious as well - from the fresh sashimi platter, maki rolls to ala carte teppanyaki dishes. We had 7 dishes in total for the 2 of us. It was a delight dining here! Highly recommended!

title: Keyaki dinner
desc: Overall dining experience was great, but Uncle Jeff‚Äôs service was 11/10! Appreciate his hospitality and care and he definitely made the entire dinner a pleasant experience. Please look out for Uncle Jeff and treat him well team :)

title: Pacific Club Weekend
desc: I had the opportunity to chill during a weekend in Sep and decided for a one night stay at Pan Pacific Singapore. Love the ambience at check-in area for Discovery members. Gian was immensely friendly and hospitable in assisting with my check-in. Pacific Club is my hang-out place whenever I am at PPSG. Shine and her team of Sugu, Asher, Aldrin, Luther, Ramyah, Salman and Roger were fabulous in welcoming me (and all Club guests) "home". It was great to be back and the team on Level 38 made every effort for all guests to be comfortable. This is indeed an inclusive environment for all guests. There was never an awkward moment in the customer experience and journey. Great job!

title: Great service and nice items!
desc: Great service by Korwin Li! Thanks so much for being so attentive and even noticing that it‚Äôs my daughter‚Äôs birthday. Hence the nice cake too! Always enjoy the edge and this was the icing on top of the cake üëçüòä

title: Edge breakfast buffet

title: Rooms have good soundproofing
desc: Recently Stayed for a night with family. Was hoping for early check in so was told to arrive at 1pm. Check in was pretty smooth and was upgraded to a higher floor. Although felt abit taken aback when the guy at the counter who kept emphasising that they usually don‚Äôt allow or they will charge for early check in. Don‚Äôt really feel the need to repeat that line a few times.I‚Äôm not slow I got it the first time. He also requested me to give a good review after my stay, This was very inappropriate. The room was recently renovated which was nice. However the main issue we had was the bed.It squeaked loudly every time we made any movement on it.being a light sleeper , the whole night when I turned , it squeaked thus waking me up. The mattress on the bed seemed like it has seen better

title: Excellent
desc: Thanks to Apple and Michelle who served our dinner today. Besides the delicious food, the nice ambience, most importantly we are well served by these 2 wonderful ladies. We had a very enjoyable night at Hai Tien Lo

title: Good food & customer service
desc: Went to Hai Tien Lo restaurant for a birthday dinner. Overall food and service is pretty good! Served by Apple, she's very attentive to our needs and it makes our first experience with HTL a good one. Thank you ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Keyaki Japanese rstnt
desc: Very friendly waitresses and nice ambience‚Ä¶Vincent Yaw‚Äôs service is top notch. The food were so fresh. Dessert were so yummy, We had black sesame and yuzu ice cream‚Ä¶.This will be always my first choice of Japanese restaurant. Love it‚Ä¶

title: Shiok meal at Keyaki
desc: We had a wonderful teppanyaki lunch with a very friendly chef named Carson. He not only constantly checks on the standard of the food he cooked, but also is willing to provide us with a signature dessert he created himself. He also specially wrote for us a "happy birthday" using salt.

title: Great food and fantastic service!
desc: We were there for a celebration and Chef Eamon was engaging and friendly during the entire meal. Great food and wonderful experience. Serving was huge and high quality produce. Highly recommend the wagyu beef and lobster. Definitely worth a visit!

title: The Edge dining experience
desc: My family had an enjoyable dinner at The Edge. The buffet spread was good and we especially loved the seafood and dessert selections. Kudos to Mr Mohamed Seraaj who rendered excellent customer service with a smile to our table. He regularly checked in with us and his thoughtfulness made us feel pampered beyond measure. üëçüëçüëç

title: Nice dark tone decor, mocktail and charcuterie.
desc: I expected the bar decor to be more green, probably it being a bird theme. But it is in dark tone, which is nice too. Having Flutter mocktail of black tea, raspberry, bee pollen, lemon and a not so atas charcuterie platter which suits my palate.

title: An Unique Bar for Great Drinks!
desc: We went to Plume for drinks and dinner on a Friday night. A very chic bar with excellent services and very creative cocktail drinks. A luxury environment to chill out with friends and on business.

title: Wonderful service and attentive hostesses Nicole and Liz with great food. We celebrated a birthday lunch here
desc: We celebrated a birthday lunch here as a family of 6. We ordered the weekend set menu. Food was delicious with excellent service and attention to detail by our hostesses both Nicole and Liz. They have a beautiful garden. We would love to come back again.

title: top
desc: We ate at Hai Tien Lo restaurant at the Pan Pacific, it was the first time I tried their proposal but Michelle assistant at the room guided us in a unique experience. Elegance of the restaurant and the location will definitely bring me back

title: PLUME - Awesome Service & Great Menus
desc: Heard of the newly minted bar thru email. Booked it and loving it. The service is superb, special mentioned to Putra. Very friendly and knowledgeable on the menus and recommendations. My friends and I truly enjoy this new bar. Food and Cocktails are amazing where we keep ordering more. The manager, Han gave us some in depth info about the new bar. Thank you for the awesome superb service.

title: Mesmerising teppanyaki experience
desc: All ingredients were really high quality and delicious. But what really stood out for us was Carson's extraordinary service and showmanship. As our chef, he really gave us a memorable experience, with his skillful performance on the grill, and several thoughtful gestures. A great place to come for celebrating special occasions.

title: Birthday celebration
desc: Amazing evening at Keyaki, served by Edriani and Reuben. Had a pleasant birthday celebration! Must order amazing fresh sashimi, soba, spider maki (we ordered 2x) and chicken kaarage. Will definitely come back again.

title: Long wait lines
desc: Though the stay was comfortable and the hotel clean and lovely, there should be better and more efficient service. There should be more counters open during check out at 12. There was a long queue of people waiting to check out. For a 5 star hotel, this can be improved.

title: Amazing hotel at the heart of the City
desc: If you're looking for a place that is amazing and near all the attraction, Pan Pacific is a good place to stay while in Singapore. good amenities, waling distance to the tourist attraction, accessible for transportation and malls connecting for your shopping needs. I love our room it has a nice and spacious area overlooking the Singapore Flyer. nice and comfy bed and of course the bathroom that comes with a tub for relax and quality "me time " experience. it comes with a nice smelling toiletries it comes with buffet Breakfast with we all love and various variety of menu to choice from. after brekky, we headed down to the pool and relax by the pool sun bed. enjoying. that sums up our luxurious experience at a minimal cost. Pan pacific doesnt disappoint :) xoxo next time

title: Highly recommended
desc: Great place to unwind, beautiful hotel. If you‚Äôre looking for a hotel in SG, this would be the option for you. Impeccable service and the staff are super friendly. Do give it a shot, you won‚Äôt regret.

title: Glamorous and civilized, order and clean, nice people and a awesome food!!
desc: It was a great experience for me and my wife, we visited on our way, city of Singapore, with his amaising building specialy in Harbour area, the famous hotel Peninsula and botanic gardens!!.It was the celebration of Singapore State town, everything was in celebration coat, and a lot of people were celebrating!!. We visited Victorian buildings, the famous China Market and Small India, the building of Fire extinguisher building, metro rail ways and many Malls!!

title: Friendly & Great Experience with Excellent Service
desc: We were greeted and serviced daily at the Edge Buffet Breakfast by Janice who was a highlight of our trip with her great enthusiasm and friendly nature. She was very comforting and gave us many tips for our holiday while here in Singapore.

title: Delicious food
desc: My friend bought me to pan pacific to had dinner, the food was great and was serve on time. Despite that it was a busy period during dinner, the manager John Ong came and ask if we need anything, and was caring.

title: Honeymoon 1st leg
desc: This hotel is fabulous. Staff are amazing, (special shout out for TJ on the concierge desk, his enthusiasm for his work is off the scale). Perfectly situated for Marina Bay Sands, Gardens by the Bay, Raffles Hotel, Clarke Quay, Boat Quay, Botanic Gardens, Singapore Flyer, Little India, China Town and just about anything else you could possibly want to see or do in the City. The hotel pool is gorgeous and so relaxing. Hotel is spotlessly clean, rooms are beautiful and comfortable. I really can't big this place up enough.

title: None
desc: Thank you Team, I enjoyed my stay and slept well. I greatly appreciate the request for additional pillows. I love the size of the King Bed, that's one of the reason I am back to stay with you :) A good sleep always make my day ends with a SMILE. Breakfast was good but slightly noisy thou. Have a great day ahead :)

title: Great food and impeccable service
desc: Awesome food and great service from all restaurant staff, especially Jeff, who was exceptionally friendly and helpful! He made great recommendations and had a smile on his face while attending to us (: We had a great time overall and would highly recommend Keyaki to everyone!

title: Great hotel service let down by poorly trained sales and reservation dept
desc: My stay at Pan Pacific was fantasic and the service was excellence. However i cannot say the same for the room reservation experience. Poorly trained sales and reservation team that bungled up price matching.

title: Pleasant stay
desc: Lovely staff (Abhi), we asked for 2 rooms close to each other and he is willing to help us and successfully find the rooms, Great location close to MRT but we mostly use taxi which is always available in front of the hotel, close to shopping mall and restaurants, We really had a great time here. Highly recommended

title: Highly recommended‚Ä¶ check the review for details
desc: Overall the hotel was very good, location was prime, staff extremely helpful and friendly, rooms were comfortable‚Ä¶ If anything needs an update it would be the carpets in the room as carpets in general are not the most hygienic things in hotel rooms.. I also like the fact that the hotel showers had big bottles of shampoo, shower gel and conditioner installed, as this reduces the amount of plastic waste from the small disposable bottles.. this is the best thing for an environmentally conscious hotel.. The hotel buffet had a wide variety of different cuisines and the room service was good as well.. Bed was comfortable, room balcony had a nice view‚Ä¶ Hotel was connected to two malls and you can cross to the Bay Area from the sky bridge..

title: Mixed feelings- last stay in 2019 was so much better
desc: Helpful and friendly staff, good concierge service. Actually only one minus point- breakfast is rather poor. Very limited selection at buffet, no variations at all during our 4 days stay, quality of food average at best, taste of food below average

title: Very Disappointed
desc: Hubby & I have been to the Pan Pacific Marina Bay for 8 times now. We have always had a perfect holiday so get really excited to go back. Especially so this time as we waited for 4 years due to personal reasons & Covid. Unfortunately our experience this time was terrible & we left very upset & honestly are thinking of not going back again, which is unheard of for us. The stay didn't start well.... We arrived from the UK at 6 am which we have done many times before. The receptionist was unhelpful & basically gave us a "don't give a toss" attitude! We were told we couldn't check in for at least 8 HOURS!!! We asked if there was a room we could freshen up & change so we didn't have to sit in reception for this amount of time. We were told no as the hotel had an event the previous

title: Professional staff, View of Marina Floating Platform, Breakfast could be better
desc: We had various unique questions and requests, and the reservations team was prompt and professional in handling them. Thankful that they arranged for us the two conjoint rooms with the best view of the National Day Parade happening on the Marina Floating Platform, and we could witness all the live action of the parade from the comfort of our room. Checking in and out took less than five minutes each, even though they only had two staff at the Front Desk at any one time. Front desk manager Alicia was quick to come out of her office to offer assistance whenever she noticed that guests were in the queue for a few minutes. Amazing proactiveness. Location-wise, it is amazingly well connected to Marina Square, Suntec City and Millenia Walk as they are all less than 3 minutes' walk

title: Wonderful Allan (Alan) !
desc: As a regular patrons of this hotel, I was attracted to try the floating pods over a reflection pool at the lobby Pan Pacific hotel hence I decided to drop by to experience it. Being told one of the luxury hotel in Singapore, the service we experienced received in this outlet was downfall to compared to other luxury hotel. Staff who attended to us, a man & a lady (wearing a black suit) didn‚Äôt met our expectations as the basic body language, the tone of voice as well as the communication, how they carry themselves is very unprofessional. It gives a negative connotation to Pan Pacific. The food was average and we are unable to request for how the doneness for the beef burger (it‚Äôs all well done only). Our request was outright rejected without any options given. On settling

title: Great Hotel let down by disappointing Club experience
desc: We have been staying at the PanPacific for many years. It has always been our hotel of choice. We returned after the couple of years od covid lockdown expecting the hotel to be the same as the pre-covid days. We stayed for 13 nigts from 27 JUne 2022 to 10 July 2022. The hotel itself is the same and the Club suites are just as they used to be. The staff at the Club lounge (eg Shine, Macluther are still there are doing a wonderful job as they always have. A lovely group of professional and attendtive staff - who have become friends over the years). We stayed for 2 weeks. Lovely suites. Great check in experience and great communication from Shine, who was always extremely helpful and professional. But the overall experience was very disappointing. The new management of the Hotel

title: Great visit. Great Service
desc: Stayed at Pan Pacific for almost 20 days and the entire stay was fantastic. What stood out for me were the servicing standards at the hotel be it at the pool, reception, room and at the buffet restaurant Edge. Special shoutout to Janice at the Edge for making the breakfast routine comfortable and delightful with her promptness and care.

title: Great hotel in great location
desc: Beautiful hotel, lovely rooms . Great service. Very close to Gardens on the bay and Marina bay attractions. Club room experience is fabulous with panoramic views of the bay and excellent selection of snacks in the evening.

title: Avoid in-room dining.
desc: The burger ordered was cooked to just before it became a briquet. Extremely dry and tasteless. Wagyu beef burger? I've had juicier burgers at the local McD. Eat at at the cafe, so it's easier to feedback.

title: Exceeded Expectation Services from PanPac
desc: The hotel services is top notch. My special request made was met and exceeded my expectation. Thank you for making my wedding anniversary a special and fruitful one. Thank You Abhi for your outstanding counter services. Rest of the hotel facility i wont go into details, they are very good and proper upkeep. Good work Pan Pacific Team. Will revisit my stay again soon with Pan Pacific

title: Birthday - Great Service by Jeff
desc: We had the Keyaki Kaiseki 8 course meal. Jeff (our server) was very passionate about the food and offered interesting insights about the flavours and how it was meant to be enjoyed. Also recommended a fantastic sake for ladies. Great service and food for a birthday celebration!

title: Disappointing.
desc: Not well trained staff, extremely long check out, rooms are old and not in adequate condition, price too high for what you get. I will not come back. Positive was the view on Marina bay and the location.

title: Will never return - very disappointed in Singapore
desc: Property was decent, service and processes are horrible. Room itself was musty and old, but decently-maintained. 1. Pre-charged me 150% of the room fee on booking. When asked why, staff had no idea why and refunded me the extra 50%. While emailing reservations support, the staff tried to upsell me a package instead of trying to resolve my problems. 2. Did not give me the free carpark coupon which was my entitlement. The carpark fee would have been $50 otherwise. Had to queue all over again to get it (oh, and check in is very long!) 3. Made me pay for a kids meal when as part of the family package, kids should have dined free. This was despite me asking staff to double-check whether my package had any offers. 4. Served my kids 2 days expired macarons as part of the

title: Keyaki Restaurant
desc: Paid this restaurant a visit for my mother‚Äôs birthday. Ambience is beautiful; there is a koi pond and waterfall outside, and the architecture whisks you to Japan. The food is wonderful, particularly the teppanyaki dishes they are famous for. Our server, Jeff, was adorable and gave great recommendations for food. Jeff was always on top of everything, and I was really impressed by his top-notch service. Can‚Äôt wait to come again :)

title: bad service
desc: I travel a lot and stay in 5-star hotels, but the stay in your hotel was the worst, as there are not enough staff for the reception, as it took me more than an hour to check in & i have 2 rooms i got one and the other was not ready till 2 hours later please note my checkin time was 3:30pm

title: Birthday Celebration at Keyaki
desc: Very dedicated crew that makes you feel welcomed throughout. Jeff was particularly dedicated and prepared a small surprise for the birthday boy (my husband). Food was preparation was masterful. Ingredients were of quality. A very pleasant Japanese cuisine on the overall.

title: Seriously high end. Loved it
desc: We stayed in the Skyline Suite. The views from the room were breathtaking by day and even more stunning by night. The glass walled lift on the way up giving views of the city was also a nice touch. The room was clean, spacious and serviced daily. The gym was upmarket and well-equipped and the lobby and bar had a trendy, high-end feel to them. We absolutely loved the Pacific Club Lounge, particularly the afternoon tea and cocktail hour. The staff throughout the hotel were friendly and helpful. Dian in the Pacific Club Lounge particularly stood out. As well ask keeping us well oiled with the complimentary champagne, she was also very friendly and gave us lots of tips on places to visit and food and drink to try. Breakfast was served in a pleasant restaurant and there was a

title: High tea at atrium
desc: Enjoyed the high tea set and the service was superb. Jia Yi and Alan were attentive to our needs and very helpful! We had a hen‚Äôs party for my sister and they helped to coordinate the photo taking and even gave us an extra cake for the occasion.

title: Anniversary Celebration
desc: The food is really delicious and how the service are all very efficient and fast. Especially Jeff who served us. He was really friendly and even let us know that our food has arrived. He even offered to take photo for us. At the same time, he also have good recommendation for the food. I love the tuna belly and wagyu beef the most as it was thick cut and juicy for the beef.

title: Helpful and Friendly Service Crew
desc: The service crew (Jiayi & Alan) was very helpful and friendly - went to the extra mile to make our high tea experience a seamless and enjoyable one. Above all, the comfortable seating and relaxing ambience contributed to our pleasant time. Thank you so much!

title: Beautiful hitel, highly recommend.
desc: Beautiful and centrally located hotel. We had a very comfortable room with balcony and magnificent views of both Marina Bay Sands and the merlion. Staff is very friendly and helpful. We were here on a 2 day layover and it was very nice to relax at the pool and recover from jetlag. Lots of sunbeds in the shadow, great views from the pool. Hotel is connected to a shopping mall and we walked to the Marina Bay area in 10 minutes ( partially via the the shopping mall in the airco).

title: Great experience at the place and food was good.
desc: Bought my friend over for dinner, it was their first time and they had a great impression. Even though it was busy, the staff are still friendly and helpful. The food was great too. Frankie, Michelle and Tian Tian were helpful. I Will definitely visit again.

title: What an unforgettable Lunch
desc: Jeffery, the waiter who served us, really went above and beyond to ensure that all our needs were met. When he knew that one of the member in the family is celebrating her birthday, he arranged for a complementary birthday cake. What an enjoyable experience. On top of that the food was fantastic as well.

title: Nice vacation
desc: This is the 2nd time we stay at this hotel. After 5 years, we still have good experience. The breakfast buffet is still good. The rooms and common areas are well maintained. The location of the hotel is a plus.

title: Amazing food
desc: Jeff provides amazing services! Came here for a friend‚Äôs birthday and was pleasantly surprised by Jeff‚Äôs attentiveness :) He even brought a cake for us and check in on us every now and then without interruption! Food was okay tho but the exterior is pretty

title: Testimonial for Jeff
desc: Dinner was good and service was excellent. We were serve by Jeff who was really attentive and service oriented. He realised that it‚Äôs my friend‚Äôs birthday and he offered to give us a cake. He takes pride in his work and could feel his passion in his job. Really had a great dining experience Here! Great work mr Jeff! We had a great time a keyaki and would definitely recommend my friends here.

title: Nice hotel, good location‚Ä¶,.
desc: Nice hotel in a good location with good food options and great gym and pool facilities. Service was excellent, only downside is that you will pay extra for everything (early/late check in, check out), extra bed, room upgrade at hotels suggestion, which is slightly disappointing given not the cheapest option to start‚Ä¶..

title: Front office staff is not friendly and not helpful
desc: During checkin, i do not feel been treated as a guest in the hotel. Front office staff just showing her not so happy face and implying that is not my problem. She try not to listen to the customer explanation

title: Keyaki - birthday lunch
desc: I was here with my friends for my birthday celebration in July. Came with a cake. Nice ambience and experience. First weekend here for the brunch. The food was served promptly by Alicia and Jeff. The recommended drink goes well with the food.

title: 1 Star Service
desc: We have went to many 5 star hotels in Singapore for staycation but Pan Pacific Hotel is the worse in terms of value and service. We had to queue super long during check in when there weren't many people in the first place. The counter only had two pax and waved us away when we told them we had already checked in earlier and were just waiting for keys. So we wanted to go to this Urban Jungle Village place which was a kids playground and they had this socks policy which was fine. But we didn't have any and asked if we could purchase one but no they didn't have any for sale and just pointed us out without any form of solution. We eventually headed to Marina Square to play at Pororo Park which had socks for sale. Compared with the kids playground at Shangri-la Hotel, the one at

title: A cosy and intimate wedding
desc: We held an intimate solemnization ceremony & dinner celebration at Hai Tien Lo. The service team was good and food was delicious and aesthetically pleasing. Chose this hotel also due to the spacious lobby, walkways and drive-in area making both ourselves and our guests comfortable.

title: Keyaki, Pan Pacific Hotel - birthday celebration
desc: Very aesthetic and good for photo taking, especially in the outdoor garden. Food was great but servings were on the smaller side and a little pricey. The codfish with miso and sashimi was my favourite. Good place to celebrate a special occasion. Service was very friendly and attentive, our main server Jeff was also very helpful and gave good tips and recommendations. All the servers were warm and personable.

title: Thank you
desc: My baggage was stored when I left the hotel in early March 2020, which was supposed to be retrieved when I was to return at the end of March.   I went back to collect the baggages recently(July 2022), I was very surprised to see all my 3 pieces of baggage are still in such good condition,  and even my leather shoes were still clean without any mould! And everything else are all in good condition as it was.   Obviously the baggage must had been kept in good temperature,  without any pressure on it.   I would also like to commend on a few of your staffs,  who had been ever so helpful,  friendly and professional in their job, both during my email communication with them,  one phone call last week (takes to Debbie), as well as during my collection time this afternoon.--

title: Friday Dinner @ Keyaki, Pan Pacific Singapore
desc: Had a casual dinner on friday with my partner. Friendly service & delicate nice meal of teppanyaki. Chef Tommy Yeo is a great host with 30years of teppanyaki fine dining experience. Recommended. out. Beautiful Japanese nice garden and vibes for a great private dining.

title: High tea
desc: The staff is very helpful and friendly especially kishore lemma! He is very friendly and fun to chat w! Food is ok but ambience and place is good for a afternoon of relaxation and fun. Excellent place for afternoon of fun

title: None
desc: I am enjoy with my stay in this hotel, staffs are friendly and help-full. Location is very good close to the key attractions place and very convenient for transportation. Many shopping center around there. Food are yummy and clean. I would recommend to there this hotel as it offer good price with excellent services.

title: BEST TEPPANYAKI IN TOWN
desc: Had a wonderful Teppanyaki Lunch at Keyaki. Feels like we are in Japan. Our Chef Tommy Yeo was friendly in serving us, patiently recommended the menu and prepared a tasty meal for my wife and me. Will visit again!

title: Yummy Teppanyaki with a great view
desc: Been to Keyaki afew times and its the first time for me to try their teppanyaki menu. Chef Tommy is very friendly and we ordered based on his recommendation. We truly enjoyed our lunch, not only the food is fresh and price worthy, we get to enjoyed a little bit of stunt show from Chef Tommy. Please order the beef fillet, the meat is soooo tender ü•∞ Chef Tommy never disappoint!

title: Great dim sum selection and service!
desc: Dined at Hai Tien Lo today and had a selection of Dim Sum and dessert based on Manager, Mr John Ong's recommendation. Food quality was good, fresh and it was such a short by satisfying lunch. Paulyn was great with her service and very attentive. Definitely worth a visit!

title: Afternoon Tea @ Atrium
desc: We came to Atrium in the lobby of the PanPacific hotel for the afternoon tea. The ambiance was absolutely wonderful. The service was fantastic and the hosts were very friendly. The menu has just changed to include some more Singapore-specific items and we loved trying these unique dishes.

title: Good nice
desc: Paulyn and Mr Chow helped to serve us. They were very helpful. The food is nice and delicious. worth coming back. Some of the food that are nice includes the desert and dim sum. The ambience is also very good. And the staff are all very helpful and attentive.

title: Great family stay
desc: Lovely rooms, comfortable beds, amazing breakfasts and great pool. We had two interconnecting rooms. The staff were very helpful. The only thing I would change is that all the restaurants were too expensive for us - it would have been nice to have a more affordable option available within the hotel.

title: Sunday brunch
desc: One of the best Sunday brunch in tow. We were served by friendly Janice with generous pour of free flow champagne. Very attentive and great service by Janice. In addition, we got the table overlooking Singapore flyerüëç

title: Amazing 2 night stay
desc: Had short 2 night staycation to celebrate my birthday Check in was smooth requested for an earlier timing , and staff are at the counter are friendly & courteous Breakfast choice was good but not sure if there are minor changes to the variety since I had only 2 mornings there Staff at the Atrium were really amazing and ensured you were having good experience In room dining was great - food portion and taste was so good. Overall had great experience with no issues with Pan Pacific,

title: Average experience
desc: The rooms promoted are the new style rooms, which have not yet been rolled out. You have to do the usual call to room service, due to lack of towels, pillows etc, even though you‚Äôve booked for 4. Extra bed wasn‚Äôt there for the tired kids‚Ä¶. The usual average hotel experience that I was hoping to avoid

title: Hai Tien Lo Dim Sum Buffet
desc: I would like to specially comment on Paulyn, Hui Qi & Ryan for the great service & hospitality while I was dining in Hai Tien Lo with my husband. The spread was amazing! Every dishes was up to my expectations. I would definitely come back here again. Thank you Paulyn, Hui Qi & Ryan!

title: Memories of Keyaki
desc: Food is delicious and presented prettily. We were mainly served by Jeff, who were very attentive and nice. As it is our first time here, he has recommended us the right choice and right portion. He has also made our visit here very comfortable and prepared a surprised cake as we came to celebrate birthday.

title: Birthday celebration
desc: Celebrated my birthday at Hai Tien Lo. Our family‚Äôs favourite restaurant . Ordered set menu. Delicious food. Received complimentary longevity buns. Staff Paulyn, Johan and Ryan provided very attentive service. Highly recommended .

title: Wonderful experience at Hai Tien Lo
desc: If you're looking for a restaurant with attentive and friendly service, look no further than Hai Tien Lo. From the moment you step through the door, the staff will go out of their way to make you feel welcome. They'll help you select the perfect dish from the menu, and they're always happy to give suggestions if you're not sure what you're in the mood for. They even provide attentive service during your meal, refilling your drink or clearing your plates without even having to ask. And when it's time to leave, they'll thank you for coming and invite you to come back soon. It's no wonder why Hai Tien Lo is one of the most popular restaurants in town - their service is simply unbeatable. We took up 2 tables and will keep coming back! Kudos to the service staff, Patrick, Tian Tian,

title: stay 8-13Aug
desc: Overall was Very good services ,nice facility and in good location , bed was very comfortable . staff was very nice and work with kindness. Food &drink here also perfect . accesseries in room was good quality .

title: Wonderful Birthday Dinner
desc: Wonderful service and food by Mr. Tommy Yeo as well as Suresh for our special occasion today! Highlights of the meal included the beef tenderloin as well as the lobster. We were able to get the lobster infused with the miso soup as well! Will be back for future occasions :)

title: Best dinner experience at the Edge
desc: Out dining experience was brilliant. Quality food, fresh and delicious seafood and more, an extensive smorgasbord of food , it was unbelievable and never ending with an array of choices. The staff were all very friendly and helpful. Definitely recommend and a highlight of our trip.

title: Mrs
desc: Nice hotel with excelent service and facilities Very good restaurant and comfort bedroom and big size Good area near shopping mall . And many facilities and the hotel clean and safe for tourist. I will be back if I visit singapore again. Nice lobby hotel with good interior make me relax stay in Pan pacific Hotel.

title: Excellent Service
desc: We are having good time at the restaurant and the food was nice and comfort. Couple with prompt services provided by Paulyn, Ryan, Huiqi and the team, we are well taken care of. Thanks and will recommend friends back to this house

title: None
desc: It was a good stay on a business trip, the staff is courteous enough for all the requirements. The only request is to have one more option of Indian Breakfast other than Idli Vada. Rest all is well maintained

title: WAITER STEVEN
desc: Steven is very kind and helpful. He provided us with excellent service. We have a very memorable experience at the restaurant because of Steven. I will come back to Edge again because of his good service. Edge is very blessed to have a good employee like Steven. In my opinion, the seafood buffet wasn‚Äôt really worth the price charged at $115 as the chilli crab meat were soft and not fresh. The crabs were small too. I was expect pure cheese lobsters and oysters as mentioned in the menu but it was not as appealing as it sounded. The restaurant also demanded for advance deposit payment for late cancellation. I expected a seafood buffet from Edge to be of better quality than other restaurants. It was quite a disappointment despite its wide variety of dishes. Tea was also

title: Thoroughly enjoyed our stay
desc: Check-in was trouble free. Our room was clean-as and neat as a pin. Housekeeping were great. We had a 'bay view' room and weren't too high up (Level 6 I think) but we still had a great view of the Marina Bay Sands and the Singapore Flyer. We didn't eat in much as we were always out exploring but breakfast every morning was fantastic. We did the seafood buffet one night and it was great. We (myself, partner, 9yo) had drinks in the lounge one night before dinner and our waiter made such a fuss over our son spoiling him with soft drinks, mocktails, chips... I think he had more fun than we did. The hotel was only a short taxi/MRT ride to all of the popular hawker centres and the Marina Bay precinct. On check out we were allowed to leave our bags, go out all day and come back and

title: Luxurious Stay Around the Bay Area for a Steal
desc: My wife and I celebrated our anniversary in this hotel. As our anniversary is around National Day, we planned long in advance to purchase this stay. We took the deal which offers the room faces west/north-west, called the Panorama Room, which has floor to ceiling glass windows with views of Suntec Convention Center. The room was spacious and clean, the bed was plush and comfortable. The breakfast had a wide spread and the food quality was good. We also suggest dining at the Japanese restaurant in the hotel which serves exquisite japanese dining.

title: A comfortable stay but a bit tired.
desc: Stayed in August for 7 nights in what was then known as a Harbour Studio (the hotel seems to be undergoing changes) and is now known as a Pacific Club room. At the time the room did not any lounge access, and apparently now if you choose that room it comes at a premium price and includes access to the Pacific club lounge. The room has great views of Marina Bay although it would be certainly nicer if the windows were floor to ceiling instead of being cut off halfway. The room was nice and comfortable however looking a little tired. The brown features are no longer modern, there were weird lumps in the carpeting, the TV is small and old. Cleaning of the room left a little to be desired. I noticed a big toothpaste streak on the shower wall that remained while we were there,

title: A home from home
desc: Covid permitting, we have been regular visitors to Singapore and the Pan Pacific Singapore for over 12 years. By our friends TJ, Jennifer Wong and Shine, among many others, we have always been treated like close friends. There is nowhere else in Singapore we we would consider staying. The Pan Pacific is indeed a home away from home for us. We look forward to visiting again in 2023.

title: Excellent service by janice!
desc: Stayed at pan pacific for 4 days 3 nights. As our hotel room includes breakfast, janice remembers us despite seeing each other once. She obliged when we wanted to change seats and reminded us that our club room has perks of sitting near the view area. When we went for breakfast the next day, she happily greeted us and gave us a more cozy space where it‚Äôs more private. We would like to compliment her excellent service and all other hotel crew who remembered us. We enjoyed our stay here and will be back again!

title: Partners birthday celebration
desc: Had a staycation at the end of August 2022 to celebrate my partners birthday. The surprise was a success and the room was great as well. The view of Marina Bay was breathtaking, which added value to the celebration as well. Special shout-out to Bobby, Shawn and Xin Fang for the hospitality when I checked into the room. They assisted me thoroughly at the front desk. Thank you for making the experience special for both us üí™üèª

title: The perfect staycation
desc: Celebrated my daughter‚Äôs birthday at the hotel, every aspect of the establishment met my expectation. Very good location, stone‚Äôs throw from Suntec and Marina Square. Service: Excellent, staff were all well trained, warm and friendly. Lanky counter staff (Jonathan) was professional, genuine and thorough, proactively suggested kids activities and was friendly to my daughter. Room: Jonathan apologised for the renovation noise we may experience, but we did not hear any drilling or knocking throughout the 3D2N. Soap smells very nice. Edge: Food and service was nice, variety was good, porridge fantastic. Female China chef makes gorgeous and delicious omelette. One auntie staff kept removing my cutleries whenever I leave my seat for seconds, not great. Pool: Nice and clean,

title: Comfortable stay
desc: Hotel is right in the centre and walking distance to most things, pool on the roof is great and amenities were very nice. Breakfast was really good and so much choice ! We stayed as a family in an interconnecting room ( 4 Children - 2,4,6,8), visited the outdoor food market and raffles long bar ( kids are also welcome here )

title: Superb hotel!
desc: We had such a superb stay here. We stayed on the 15th floor and we given the option to check in early. After our flight landed at 8:30 this was greatly received. The amount of space we had in our room was great and we were pleased with how clean and tidy it was. Breakfast was ace, we were looked after very well. If we ever find ourselves in Singapore again we will definitely be staying here!

title: Would not correct error in reservation. Completely non-responsive
desc: I made an on-line reservation for this hotel and the dates came up wrong - wrong month, wrong year. I immediately tried to contact them, but had to wait several hours as the office was not open. After being cut off twice (I think the office is in China) I was told to write an e-mail. Then I got a response that they would not correct the "non-refundable" reservation. I'm extremely frustrated as I won't be in Singapore when the reservation is dated. Its not a cheap hotel, so I won't pay $1500 for an error from their website. BE VERY CAREFUL IF YOU BOOK, OR BETTER STILL, PICK ANOTHER HOTEL.

title: Teppanyaki
desc: Good selection of food.chef Tommy has been very welcoming and friendly..has extended a great deal of effort in making sure our food is accordingly to our expectations.even take up the role of the server whom are missing, clearing the plates for us. Kudos tommy

title: Pan Pacific - wonderful
desc: Beautiful hotel, perfect location, great food, wonderful facilities, brilliant staff. My second time. Outstanding pool, gym, food restaurants and buffet - wow. Lovely room. Could not have chosen better.

title: Mr
desc: late house keeping, slow response from bar, waiting for ages on response , found the staffs from the bar were totally ant slow. the housekeeper were always late even i called up the hotel to record specific timing that i will be away.

title: Keyaki food
desc: Tommy Yeo was our chef. Very friendly and courteous . Execelent service and food. The beef teppanyaki was excellent and was a highlight of my meal. This however doesnt overshadow everyother food on the menu. It was a fine dining experience throughout Will definitely recommend to everyone!

title: Comfortable Hotel Option
desc: 3 night stay in a City Suite was a comfortable experience. Check in process was quick, staff friendly and room was available early for us to access. Room itself was spacious, pretty well appointed with good electric block out blinds, big Samsung screens in both the bedroom and separate lounge, well appointed bathroom with good water pressure, and a second toilet near the entry door which was handy. Fridge was on the small side whuch limits your own storage of cool drinks. Mini bar was complementary and contained the basics, but was not restocked during our stay. Plenty of bottled water was available though and was restocked each day. The room we had was weirdly not on the same lifts that service the Pacific Club lounge so for us was Level 11 down to Level 4, change lifts,

title: Birthday Lunch at Keyaki
desc: Went to Keyaki for tenpayaki lunch to celebrate with my sister. We were served by chef Tommy, he was very friendly, detail (advise on the sequence to start eating when the dish was served for best taste) and skilful in displaying his teriyaki frying skill. We were also surprised with complementary mini birthday cake and a birthday 'card' made from salt on plate. Highly recommended.

title: Great Location
desc: My wife and I stayed in a standard room for 5 nights in early January. The hotel is in an excellent location just a few minutes walk from the Bay and its attractions and it is also very close to the Singapore underground which is excellent. Breakfast was really good, lots of choice and service was also excellent. Very happy with our stay and we would stay again if coming to Singapore.

title: Dinner at the Edge
desc: I throughly enjoyed the food and the excellent service from Steven. Even though the restaurant was crowded, the waiters and waitresses were all very efficient. The food was good however the selection became smaller as compared to pre covid times. Still a good experience nonetheless

title: Excellent service
desc: Celebrated my father-in-law‚Äôs 90th birthday. We had a good time as we had booked the Ruby private room in Hai Tien Lo. A big Thank you to Genevieve. She has been so helpful in replying to my enquiries and emails very promptly. Also to Michelle and Uncle Chow who took care of us with all the yummy dishes and our requests. Really appreciate it. We will definitely be back.

title: Consistent service standards from Kelly
desc: This is our second time at Hai Tian Lou and we were served by Kelly for the second time. We have already treated her as a friend as she was easy going, approachable and made us feel like home. Thanks Kelly for the wonderful experience and making our two birthday meals memorable.

title: Best when you travel with kids
desc: Spacious harbour suite with MBS view was very lovely. We enjoyed it very much. Hotel is just a step away from Marina Sq, Suntec City, Millenia Walk - so convenient for foods/supermarket/shops. Breakfast was excellent - fruits, asian, omelette/egg station, pancake/waffle, fresh juice etc. My toddler loves the urban jungle (play area) so much, I would definitely recommend if you are traveling with kids. It is small, but very well decorated. Pools were great with bar next to it. Thank you for providing kid‚Äôs ammenities and the lovely treats surprise prior to arrival. We love our stay and we shall be back! Cons: construction noise during the day, unfortunately we cant nap, very disadvantage if you have a light sleeper child. pillows were too soft, I didn‚Äôt ask if we can request

title: Group Dinner
desc: We booked the Pavilion of Keyaki restaurant for our team dinner. Glad to have the cozy venue dedicated to all our team members and our food pre-ordered are all well prepared and served on time. Serving crew, Wan and Joseph who were assigned were attentive, poised and respond to our service requirements promptly. We love the grilled lobster with cod roe sauce. Absolutely delightful üòò Will definitely order this again. Yes, our verdict and unanimous vote that it is our top pick for venue and food. Cecilia

title: Teppanyaki @ Keyaki Pan Pacific Hotel
desc: Had the Hana set with lobster, sashimi and scallops. Excellent food and service by Chef Tommy Yeo. Nice premium casual setting for a nice evening out with friends. A friendly chef always helps make the evening enjoyable. Highly recommended!

title: Fantastic teppanyaki
desc: Brilliant night at Keyaki Japanese restaurant. Chef Tommy Yeo‚Äôs teppanyaki was fabulous and made my daughter‚Äôs 16 birthday a memorable one. Wagyu beef and lobster - the food was absolutely fantastic and perfectly cooked. Thanks Chef Tommy

title: Teppanyaki at Keiyaki PanPacific Singapore
desc: Had an incredible dinner with chef Tommy Yeo. Not only was the food excellent, his interaction with the guests made the experience special. Service at the restaurant was also very good. Highly recommend!!

title: Overpriced - lacked in customer service
desc: We spent ten days at the Pan Pacific. Very central to everything but this hotel was overpriced with room service as well as drinks and sweets. It lacked customer service. We asked for directions to the Big Bus pickup area, we walked for one and a half ours going around in circles .. eventually the bus stop was only a 15 min walk from our hotel. We showed up and it was closed on Wednesday's . The hotel reception had no idea it wasn‚Äôt operable on Wednesday's. We asked to have drinks and dinner up at the restaurant on top floor, reception told us we weren‚Äôt permitted to go up unless we were staying above 22nd floor. Very disappointing. We were jibbed but the taxi drivers in Singapore as well. This was our second trip - would not go back again.

title: Birthday lunch celebration

title: Staycation at Pan Pacific
desc: Was a really good staycation at Pan Pacific. I was given a high floor (32nd floor) which overlooked Millenium Walk. The rooms were good and clean. Really enjoyed myself. Would highly recommend this hotel

title: Andrew Gym the legend
desc: It's has been 30 yrs we always stay at Pan Pacific Singapore and this is the first stay in this year with this lovely hotel. Andrew from the gym that always provided outstanding and professional service at his gym by assisting me and my wife workout make us felt valuable. title: Afternoon Tea

desc: Amazing services by the team led by Kishore. The staff is very attentive to wait on customer. As usual will be back soon to have a delightful tea. The service has always been impeccable. Keep up the good work.
