desc: Pros: Waitress Auntie Ng was very friendly and attentive to our table. Always smiling and checking our wine voume. Ambience was top notch, not overly crowded. Cons: Food selection can be better, not much Japanese options, salmon sashimi only arrived at the last hour of buffet and oysters were very small. Disappointing first visit. Will consider carefully before visiting Edge again for this price.

title: Scrumptious & great service
desc: Dining at Hai Tien Lo is always enjoyable, the food was scrumptious and Paulyn was great in serving us, recommending us the appropriate dishes and portion, and accommodating to our requests. Thank you Paulyn.

title: Excellent service n delicious
desc: This is my first time here, and the food here is very special and delicious. The staff service here is excellent, every one is enthusiastic and professional. Especially Frankie Manager, Kelly, Hui Qi and Ryan. I‚Äôm looking forward to coming again.

title: Room
desc: My room was smelling of cigar, not clean, water bottles was not put in my room the second day, the toilet flash was not working well, and the shower was making noise when i was using it. I expected a single big bed but it was two twin bed which was a surprise to me. Quality was not up to standard, so i did not receive the value for the money spent in this hotel. will not recommend to any other person and will report about my experience to my company.

title: Keyaki Teppanyaki
desc: We visited Keyaki for family dinner and ordered teppanyaki. Chef Tommy Yeo was great, service was excellent and food tasted amazing! He had a few specialty sauces which were out of the menu. Look for him if you are seated at the teppan table :)

title: Perfect location and excellent service
desc: We stayed at the Pan Pacific for 3 nights. It's a beautiful hotel so we'll located for the bars restaurants and shopping. It's also walking distance from the marina and Chinatown. You can't get a better location in my opinion. The pool is excellent and Singapore slings are the best! Much better than raffles long bar and you don't have to queue!! Breakfast is so tasty and loads of choice for all nationalities. The edge restaurant that breakfast is held is a lovely area and the staff are so helpful and polite. The pool is great it has changing areas to the side and the st. Gregory spa is located here too. The pool bar is great and the Singapore slings are extremely good, much better than raffles long bar and you don't have to queue! Our room was so clean the the staff were

title: Business stay at the Pan Pacific, Singapore
desc: The renovations obviously impacted on my normal experience as the lobby lounge and bar was closed, which limited my options where to hold business meetings. As a Discovery cardholder, it would have been a nice gesture had they given me access to the Pacific Lounge. Apart from the that, the quality of hotel staff and their high level of service was the same as ever.

title: Yum yum delicious
desc: Delicious and entertaining chef. Always there to serve you good food. Did some tricks to entertain us. Fire trip. Dangerous but interesting. Nice environment and clean place. Non stop services nice thinning slice garlic that every one has to keep eating

title: Chef Tommy Yeo For Keyaki Teppanyaki
desc: excellent chef who cooked very tasty teppanyaki. as it is me and my wife anniversary, chef Tommy cooked a special off the menu mayonnaise leak lobster for us as a celebratory dish. Other dishes are very delicious as well.

title: 4-star experience at 6-star price, but man what a view
desc: Marina harbor view, per the booked room class, was spectacular as expected, though unclear why we had no balcony and the room directly above/below did. Carpet looks old. Bathroom quite nice. Bed and TV were excellent. Lounge chair at window is wise. Provided Nespresso pods were all rated 8 or higher... perhaps some variety instead? The ongoing construction is poor and certainly is a demerit, but lying to guests that it will not occur on weekends is unacceptable. We saw and heard the construction work on Saturday. Military graduation from float could also be heard through outside window, indicating glass is not sound-proof enough. Edge breakfast faces morning sun... blinds are insufficient to block it for Club tables. 15 minute wait to checkout due to only 1 staff member

title: Teppanyaki at Keyaki at Pan Pacific by chef Tommy yeo
desc: Awesome food and awesome skill, thanks chef Tommy Yeo! Attention to detail to the food and to his clients are all so important for a dining experience and full marks for all of this. Gladly visit again if Chef Tommy is here

title: Keyaki Teppan
desc: Tommy Yeo is an amazing chef and provided extremely warm service! Whenever our dishes were about to finish he was already on standby and ensured all staff was prompt and friendly. Will be back soon definitely!

title: Great dining experience at Hai Tien Lo
desc: We had a lovely birthday dinner for my daughter together with the whole family at Hai Tien Lo. Service from Paulyn was fantastic and efficient. She suggested very good dishes for us to try and also surprised us with a plate of birthday longevity buns for us to celebrate the occasion. Highly recommended.

title: Nice experience in Pan pacific
desc: Hotel is so nice and clean. And waiter and waitress are nice. Most impressed me is Janice Chan in breakfast area, as yesterday I lost my cellphone, she helped me a lot on it. Very nice women! Hope to see u next time!

title: Great few days in Singapore.
desc: Lovely hotel, great location, best views of the harbour. Recommend upgrading to a club room fur access to the club lounge, even better views from up there. We had a great room with a large balcony and views. Great buffet selection at breakfast and dinner at the Edge restaurant.

title: None
desc: I am writing to let you know how much I appreciate the outstanding customer service that your staff , Abhi, Thiagu and a lady (she did our check in, unfortunately I forgot her name :( ) has provided. They all have always been very attentive, helpful and supportive. Their kind gesture and hospitality has always been beyond satisfaction. I truly feel like a guest and not just a regular customer so hats of to your team. A big thank you to Thiagu. Please let them as well as the other employees know that their efforts do not go unnoticed. Thank you once again for hiring such excellent staff and hope to see them and interact with them at my every visit/stay. With Warm Regards

title: Teppanyaki@kiseki
desc: Had a good experience w tommy the chef who was very friendly and nice!! Offered to pour us tea even though it was not his job and even wrote a thank you note on a tray using salt. Lovely chef to have around!

title: Lovely hotel with great view.
desc: Lovely hotel. Staff were all terrific, particularly the housekeeping staff and concierge. View from our room was brilliant. There was work being done in the hotel while we were there, so they upgraded our room to compensate but the work didn't impact on our experience at all.

title: A great hotel but currently undergoing refurbishment (Dec 2022)
desc: A lovely upgrade but the first room we were given was with a double bed when we'd requested two singles. Quickly resolved so no problem. Due to the refurbishment work there was a note when we arrived in the room to say that the power would be turned off for up to 90 minutes on one day of our stay. We had to go to the Reception to ask when this would be and were told 10-11:30 am so we timed breakfast to finish and be out of our room by 10. When we returned to the room at 9:45 there was no power, although it did come on again relatively quickly. More information would have been helpful. It may have been in a message on the television but as we didn't turn it on we didn't know.

title: World Class Service
desc: My wife and I recently enjoyed a lovely 3 night stay on our way home from Australia. We had a Harbour View Club room with panoramic views of the bay. We enjoyed champagne breakfast‚Äôs and dinner at Edge and leisurely afternoon tea and drinks in the Club Lounge overlooking the MBS area. The service we received on our visit was impeccable. We would like to mention Roxanne,Javi and Dexter for surpassing our high expectations and a very special mention to Kuselan from front of house external who was outstanding. He went out of his way to look after our transport needs and luggage in a very professional yet friendly manner. It was a real pleasure to be looked after by him and to have met him.He made a real impression on us and his cheery disposition and warm service has left a very

title: Great Wedding at Hai Tien Lo!
desc: had my big day at Hai Tien Lo on Nov, everything was perfect from the food and services! The food was superb, we received 0 negative feedback, every guest said it was one of the best wedding meal they've had in Singapore so far. Not only that, the amount of food given was also very generous, even for some bigger eaters it's far more than enough. The hospitality is another highlight. All the staff were very professional and served us with a big smile at all time! Specially shout out and thank you Frankie and John, you both made the wedding went so smoothly, all our guests were so happy and enjoyed the whole ceremony! Also, both of you were so creative and helped us to make the reception table become even lovelier :) Hai Tien Lo is so blessed with both of your services!

title: Keyaki Dinner
desc: Chef Tommy Yeo was excellent, friendly and skilful. Every single dish was amazing coupled with explanation of the sauces, and I don‚Äôt even fancy teppanyaki much! Will definitely be back again for more teppanyaki :)

title: Dinner 21 Nov
desc: Chef Tommy Yeo cooked us a sumptous teppan dinner, he was very thoughtful on our specific request, together with Chef Eric prepared us a special dish which was very tasty. Dinner experience was splendid.

title: Keyaki is highly recommended - look for Chef Tommy Yeo
desc: Had teppanyaki dinner at Keyaki and the service by Chef Tommy Yeo was so good! He was so attentive, recommended menu choices, helped us refilled our tea, and made sure we were having a good time. His food flavors were great too! Highly recommend and would definitely return.

title: Best Service & Food
desc: At Keyaki dated Fri 11 Nov 2022 The food is delicious & fresh, consumed sashimi, California Maki, lobster, beef Service very polite & friendly Being served by Mr Vincent, Ms Amanda, Chef Teoh, Chef Edmund & Chef Nick

title: Chef Tommy Yeo Teppayak8
desc: Chef Tommy Yeo is very polite and cooks the teppanyaki just right. Tasted Excellent beef cooked by him, just right. The lobster is also very fresh. Presentation is simple and not over the top. However hotel staff in the Japanese resturant seem to be slightly understaffed.

title: Great gesture and attention given
desc: Went with family and friends for Nov baby birthday. And when my husband was adjusting his chair, his finger nail broke. And the team members in edge was fast to get him a plaster and nail clipper. KUDOS TO THE TEAM...

title: Awesome Family Staycation!
desc: Checking-in on our first day was a breeze. Thank you, Sir Abhi, for being so accommodating. Enjoyed the Pacific Club Lounge for both Afternoon Tea, and Evening Cocktails during our 3day & 2night stay with impeccable service from Sir Matthew, Sir Aldrin, Ma'am Marinas, and the rest of the staff. The Urban Jungle Adventure Package was well worth it!

title: Awesome Teppan Chef and great food! TOMMY YEO
desc: Tommy Yeo is a magnificent host and chef at Keyaki! We got 4 sets of differing types of sets to share with the family and he automatically read our minds and distributed the food accordingly which is something I rarely experience! Would definitely be back to eat more of his food and experience his fun personality! 10/10!

title: Tommy @ keyaki teppanyaki is the best!
desc: Tommy yeo is the best - very nice guy! Would come back 100%! He really made our experience very special! Even the meat is very well done and has his special sauce! I totally forgot to take pic of all the food in between because of it!

title: Will frequent again
desc: Always frequent at Keyaki Restaurant. Food is excellent. Staff service is excellent too‚Ä¶ special thanks to Chef Edmund who always cooked nice teppanyaki, Chef Teoh and Nick at sushi counter, Vincent and Amanda friendly and attentive service.

title: birthday dinner
desc: we were served by samuel and he was very meticulous and observant with serving our needs. it was a very pleasant dinner experience because of how great samuel‚Äôs service is! food was also quite okay but samuel‚Äôs excellent service was definitely the highlight of the day!

title: Great Location
desc: Spacious room and excellent view of Marina, although found out there was renovation ongoing during the day. Not too burdensome though but did smell paint thinner one time. Very accessible between Millenia Walk, Marina Square and Suntec

title: Amanda, Vincent and the whole team is very nice!
desc: Excellent food and service! They are very accommodating and attentive. They gave a lot of good suggestions on what food to order, and showed willingness to explain the menu. On top of that, the food they served is very delicious, especially the Wagyu Beef Sirloin, Fried Rice, Mango Ume Jelly and Jelly Sake. 10/10! Great Job Amanda, Vincent and team!

title: Best Guest Host: JANICE üíú
desc: Best guest host at EDGE Restaurant ‚Äî- look for Janice! Very friendly and bubbly.. been here for 35 years! Took care of our daily breakfasts and checked on us always. Thank you Janice hope to see you again on our next visit!

title: Hai Tien Lo - Pan Pacififc ( Recommended dinning restaurant )
desc: Is my birthday dinner celebration with my families at Hai Tien Lo restaurant. Manager, Apple arranges and plans carefully on my food menu. She even throws in a free dessert for us. Good service served by Samuel and he is friendly .

title: Great tepanyaki!!
desc: Tommy Yeo was an amazing chef! I love hibachi in the US and decided I better check out something more authentic while in Singapore. Food was delicious and he went above and beyond in creating a special meal for me. Highly recommended!!

title: Compliments to Chef Tommy Yeo
desc: Chef is very caring and paced the serving of our dishes. He is very organised, however I would like to feedback other than him no one was station at the teppanyaki counter to help him out keeping the plates and refilling the water. He had to cover other server‚Äôs job. I feel like this is a huge improvement needed. In addition, I would like to also commend the good food and quality cooked by Tommy. It was really delicious and will come back definitely.

title: overall very good hotel . Recommedation for Thursday Night Buffet at the Edge at level 3.
desc: overall very good hotel . Recommedation for Thursday Night Buffet at the Edge at level 3. Seafood Night . price ok . the seafood was fresh , snow crab ok , oyster -was fresh and big size . love seafood night at Edge level 3.

title: Great dining experience!
desc: Service provided by Paulyn and Hui Qi was excellent! Kudos to both! Both paid diligent attention to my guests and tea was served or topped up without the need for asking. Service was swift and timely.

title: Don't miss oit dining at the Edge!!!
desc: Wide a variety of choices at the Edge, love each dish that we tried. Special thanks to the exceptional service from Shasha for the lovely evening. She has a cheerful personality and a great sense of humour!

title: Amazing Lunch Dim Sum Buffet ü•∞
desc: Michelle greeted us when we arrivedÔºå she is very enthusiastic about greeting us. Service is excellent ! Staff is very friendly and caring Ambience is wonderful The dessert was amazing ü§© Thank you to HTL team, especially John,Franky,Wei Jian Patrick and Ryan

title: Nice food and drinks, Helpful staff
desc: Food is nice and selection is varied. Desserts are also nice and flavourful. Kenneth attended to us and he was helpful, accommodating. Nice experience for us in the team, a smooth sailing experience for all 28 of us!

title: Fantastic Hotel
desc: This hotel is exceptionally well run. from the moment you arrive to the moment you check out your made you feel special by every single member of staff, who always greet you with a smile and a warm welcome at all times. The location is absolutely fantastic, and the rooms are very comfortable well appointed. It is very apparent that the senior management at this property are taking the time to ensure all their staff understand the importance of customer service.

title: None
desc: The distinction between good and great hotel stay for me is attention to detail. There is a sense that the attention to detail was not there. From in-room dining, to cleaning team, the hotel simply missed the mark.

title: Staycation
desc: Had an amazing 3d2n stay at pan pacific. 2nd time here. The club room was exceptional and expectation met. Room was spacious enough for us and its very clean except for the stain coffee cup. the harbour view was just breath taking and the club privilage is good. Service was excellent, but i got to mention this staff by the name of janice i think who works at edge. She makes us feel welcome and she always make us smile. Her service to our table during lunch with my family was way beyond. And of coz the indoor playground and swimming pool was sufficient for my child to enjoy the staycay. Definitely will be gg back soon.:):) please note renovation is ongoing, there might be slight noise during certain timing.

title: Amazing stay at the Pan Pacific
desc: Great location and amazing staff! The view from our room was incredible. Amazing jungle playroom for kids. The restaurant all served delicious food and the breakfast buffet was excellent. We will definitely be coming back.

title: Great Hotel good location
desc: Excellent hotel in prime location near the marina. We upgraded to club room as our booked room not ready as early check in following long flight. Facilities at Edge and club lounge worth the upgrade. Room was fine but the bed was so comfortable The renovation did not spoil our stay. Excellent hotel and staff especially Javi and Abi. Staying again 10th December looking forward to it

title: Great location, great service, great food
desc: I stayed at Pan Pacific for a seminar and there are many great things about this hotel: - the location is perfect, from there you can go anywhere and your close to garden by the bay, Chinatown etc - the view from the room is stunning - the size of the room is great - the quality of the bathroom, bed - the service, very nice people there always willing to help - the food at breakfast and lunch. So much choice from Malay, to indian, Chinese, continental, french etc and it's very good What I didn't like so much is the slight musty smell of the room and the fact that there were still hairs behind the bathtub. By the way the swimming pool is also nice.

title: Review
desc: Terrible service Not a 5 star motel when you can‚Äôt check in till alte as they forgot to put bed in room Room temp continued to be changed See feedback provided to motel, terrible for a 5 star motel o do not recommend

title: Fabulous lunch at Hai Tien Lo
desc: Celebrated by son‚Äôs birthday. This is our 3rd visit. Excellent food and service, very exquisite. Menu options are good and portion just right to minimise food wastage. We are served by Paulyn at Hai Tien Lo, she is very polite and attentive.

title: Keyaki Teppanyaki is
desc: Delicious food and wonderful service at Keyaki Teppanyaki prepared by Chef Tommy Yeo. Fun and experienced chef. The beef and seafood were perfectly cooked and well seasoned. Definitely coming back for the foie gras.

title: Edge Sunday Buffet!
desc: The food selection was exceptional and so was the quality. Really enjoyed the seafood and the nonya counters. The service too was fantastic. Especially Janice who was attending our table was very friendly and attentive. Lovely experience!

title: Top quality in Singapore
desc: Pan Pacific is a real 5 stars hotel. Every service is design around you to make you feel at home. Furthermore, food is very variegated and adapt to every single customer. One point of improvement are the windows in the rooms. The possibility to open a little bit the window to refresh air would be highly appreciated. Overall, amazing experience. Thank you very much Giulia

title: Good food, nice atmosphere
desc: Chef Tommy Yeo was friendly and served delicious food! Had a great dinner :) He served us his special citrus sauce to pair with the grilled chicken and it was really good. All of us thoroughly enjoyed the food.

title: Perfect dinner
desc: It was fantastic. Atmosphere was good, chef was engaging, staff were friendly and the food was top notch. Would definitely come back again next time for an occasion. However, it was a bit on the pricey side but it was worth the money. 10/10 would recommend

title: Gathering
desc: Loved the food & services catered at Keyaki. Tommy Yeo was super experienced & fun. Food was excellent, and Tommy was well-experienced in judging the amount of food to order for a big group to avoid over-ordering. Will come back for it again.

title: Excellent Teppanyaki
desc: Thank you Tommy Yeo for the excellent Teppanyaki! My family and I had a great time! The food was good and his culinary skills were top-notch! We left the restaurant with our hearts and belly full and will be back for more

title: Great place. Great food.
desc: Great place for dim sum lunch. We love the charcoal char siew pao. The roast duck was also excellent. The food capped with excellent service. Special mention for Samuel Lee for his attentive and friendly service

title: Great service and Location for shopping
desc: all was good, lifts a bit slow to respond and doors quickly close on you. The view of the Marina bay was overwhelming. As a resident the staff looked after us more than needed (a good thing) Great display of christmas cheer in the Hotel, thanks Pan Pacific.

title: Christmas Staycation at Pan Pac
desc: The room was spacious with a gorgeous view of Singapore landscape. The bed was awesome and the kids were welcomed with tee pees, plush toys and welcome drink. Our kids had a great time playing at the Urban Jungle Village that was clean and fun, enjoyed table tennis and life-size English Chess. The hotel is conveniently located near shopping malls and our kids enjoyed scooting along Singapore river. Lastly, the buffet breakfast has a variety of delectable food that we will spoil for choice. We were served by Janice who was friendly and approachable and our kids love chatting with her. We will definitely come back again. The only issue is that there is no lift from the car park to the hotel and we will need to carry the luggage up the stairs. To reward this laborious work, we

title: Amazing Marina Bay view....
desc: Amazing experience. Spacious room with modern amenities. The Marina Bay views from the hotel room made all the difference to our stay. We enjoyed every aspect of the stay. Thanks to all Pan Pacific staff for making my journey memorable.

title: Exceptional service from Steven
desc: The service was exceptional. Steven ensured that we were comfortable because we were encumbered with a huge stroller. He helped to find the best table for us and baby. Food was awesome. Ambience was wonderful. My family and I had a great time!

title: Teppanyaki lunch
desc: Keyaki teppanyaki restaurant. Tommy was our chef for Xmas Eve lunch and it was very smooth sailing, lots of good conversation. Would recommend for a special occasion! The ambience is great with a lot of photo opportunities

title: Xmas teppanyaki dinner
desc: We were simply blown away by Chef Tommy Yeo‚Äôs culinary skills at the teppanyaki counter. He definitely left us a very lasting impression at our dinner table, and of course highly satisfied. Strongly recommended!

title: Amazing Food and Chef ‚Äî Tommy Yeo
desc: Outstanding food and chef by Tommy Yeo‚Ä¶ If we could give 15 stars we would‚Ä¶ absolutely brilliant! Definitely worth a visit if visiting or living in Singapore. Tommy also made a special omelette not on the menu for us to try ‚Äî outstanding!!

title: Good food! Skilful chef
desc: We we‚Äôre having our lunch at Teppanyaki. Chef Tommy served us with professionalism and passion. Food is tasty and the ambience is great! I'm sure your response will be a generic canned message email, as it was last time. We gave this hotel a second chance for our honeymoon, and you can refer to our previous complaints from our stay in 2019 with your rude staff in the club lounge. title: The worst oyster I had in my life
desc: Pan Pacific is always a top hotel choice for me and my family because we held our wedding banquet here 15 years ago. Its a yearly affair we have our Xmas lunch here every year as much as possible at THE EDGE. However this year, the quality of the oysters were totally a let down. Its very salty, thin like paper and totally not fleshy at all. See my pictures. Totally ruined our family Xmas lunch and we spent a good 400 bucks down the drain. The oyster omelette we can pay $4 at hawker centers are even better quality than the ones they have in THE EDGE I read the Google reviews and seems like it's a ongoing problem and there is no service recovery at all!!! Why does the hotel continue to order such lousy oyster when so many people have feedback this issue???

title: Best buffet, service and ambiance!
desc: Food, ambiance and service are tip top. Janice was very kind and welcomed my son with a lovely cake for his birthday. She was always looking out whether we need any services and made us very comfortable throughout the lunch. Definitely a must go place for buffet with families and events!

title: 80th Birthday celebration
desc: We celebrated our Mother's 80th birthday at Hai Tien Lo and were mainly served by Paulyn. We had a private room with 2 tables. She was very attentive and took good care of all of the diners throughout our meal and also assisted with making accommodations when we realised that 2 of the diners were vegetarian and had to modify some of the dish orders. We ordered the Rose Lunch Menu and thoroughly enjoyed all the sumptuous dishes. Overall, I highly commend the service from Paulyn and the dining experience at HTL.

title: Very delicious teppanyaki and fresh seafood
desc: The food is well presented and very fresh. You can actually taste the ingredients. Price is quite decent. They are also serving very nice sake. Will definitely bring the whole family visit this place again.

title: My Trip to Singapore
desc: The pictures below that you can see. That is my favorite spot at the hotel specially during afternoon there. The view is spectacular. Plus the amazing one is the crews there specially the hotelier there named Dexter. He assisted me in a very nice way. He talked to me like we have known for a long time. He is fantastic in serving brewed coffee. His English speaking is amazing too. I would like to give him a commendation for his great services. I wish all of the hoteliers are like him with passion and dedication. The hotel is wonderful one thing that I dont like was the noise but it‚Äôs understandable because they were having a renovation. Good thing that when I went to the Club lounge and met the crews I was relieved by them specially to Dexter plus the super delicious brewed

title: Wonderful experience!
desc: I took my grandmother and relatives to Hai Tien Lo on the 20th December to celebrate her 82nd birthday and everyone had such a wonderful time there. The food and service were great! Special thanks to Samuel, Apple and Ryan for making it such a beautiful first experience. I will revisit the restaurant again for sure.

title: Breathtaking Skyline Suite
desc: We stayed at the Pan Pacific Singapore eons ago and decided to make it as our #2 stop to celebrate our wedding anniversary. We checked in on 13 December and checked out on 16 December 2022. We bought the room under the Stay 3 for the Price of 2 promotion. We originally opted for just a club room but decided to upgrade to skyline suite with aking bed instead and it is probably the best decision we‚Äôve made. We are grateful to be given an early check-in and incidentally, Mr Abhi checked us in on the day of our arrival and he also checked us out on the day of our departure. Pros: The skyline suite is a sight to behold. Really well appointed, the suite comes with a huge lounging area and a separate bedroom. There is a smaller toilet for visitors in the lounging area and a

title: NiceÔºÅ
desc: convenience location, near shopping mall, and alot variety of food nearby, Room is spacious and clean, kids love it very much. Really enjoy the stay and hope can go again next time. Thanks for the friendly staff

title: Edge restaurant Buffets
desc: The buffets at Edge restaurant are simply amazing. A wide expanse of dishes all beautifully made and presented. Everything tastes delicious. These buffets run every week day with special more expensive brunches at the weekend We particularly enjoyed the Christmas weekday buffet. A must do for any visit to Singapore. You will not be disappointed!

title: Excellent choice for a day hotel during a long layover
desc: We chose this hotel as it offer day hotel use, as we had a long layover in Singapore (15 hours). You can book your arrival time which we did, checking in at 8.30am and had use of the hotel and room until 9pm that night. The hotel itself is in an excellent location and perfect to see all the attractions near the marina area and also a great selection of restaurants within walking distance to the hotel. The room was clean, had all the regular amenities needed during a layover and was sound proof which was great as we slept for a couple of hours initially after arriving from an 11.5 hour flight. I would certainly stay at this hotel again, both as a layover hotel and also as a hotel to stay whilst in Singapore.

title: Luxury
desc: Upgraded to pacific club select studio on arrival as our request for early check in for booked room wasn‚Äôt available. Room pure luxury. Use of club room for afternoon tea and cocktails useful for short stay stop over. Pool area excellent and quiet. Disappointing breakfast on last day as not offered champagne or seated in club section. Booked transfers to and from airport with excellent service if somewhat pricey.

title: OK, but not as good as last time
desc: We like this hotel, but were somewhat disappointed with this stay. There were no issues with the room or the pool, but ongoing renovations inevitably take away from the general ambience. Most significantly for us, we were unhappy with our breakfast at Edge. It was quite an effort to get a cup of coffee and the selection of fruit available let the overall offering down. We would stay again in the hope these were one-off issues, but did not feel we got value for money on this occasion.

title: Poor check out experience
desc: Initially it was good and appreciate the effort to decorate the room and the Christmas gifts. However I could not even check in on time, much less being able to check in early, even though I am a titanium member. I was made to wait at the lounge until the room was available. But this is understandable since it is during the peak period and you may be busy. However, I find it puzzling when you guys tried to get me to check out earlier than the promised time given. Only when I said why did you find it acceptable for me to wait for my room when I checked in and yet the next guest cannot wait for their room in the lounge that you all finally understood what I meant. title: None
desc: Our stay at the Pan Pacific was as usual very good, good clean rooms, great beds and friendly and efficient staff - we were however more than a little disappointed that the works to the ground floor lobby bar had not been made known to us before our trip.

title: A Pleasant Holiday Stay
desc: We had a pleasant stay and the rooms were amazing. The hotel lobby was undergoing some renovation but that's a minor hiccup, I'm sure it would look great once done. The check-in and check-out experience was efficient and accurate. For your shopping convenience, the hotel is connected to both Marina Square and Suntec City. If you need to go further, you can use Grab or use the MRT. Overall we had a good and pleasant stay.
